paneer ghee roast recipe | veg ghee roas.name: paneer ghee roast recipe | veg ghee roast recipe | how to make paneer roast
paneer ghee roast recipe | veg ghee roas.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, to prepare masala paste heat 1 tsp ghee and roast 5 dried red chill, 1 tbsp coriander seeds, 1 tsp cumin, ¼ tsp methi, ½ tsp fennel and ½ tsp pepper.
roast on low flame until the spices turn aromatic.
further, add 4 clove garlic and saute slightly without burning.
transfer the spices into a blender and allow to cool completely.
also add 2 tbsp tamarind extract and ¼ cup water.
blend to smooth paste. masala paste is ready, keep aside.
in another pan heat 1 tsp ghee and roast 15 cubes paneer.
roast on low to medium flame or until it turns golden brown. keep aside.
in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp ghee and add ½ onion and few curry leaves.
saute until onions shrink slightly.
further add ¼ tsp turmeric and saute well.
now add in the prepared masala paste and cook well.
saute and cook well for at least 10-15 minutes or until ghee separates.
add in 2 tbsp curd and saute well until well combined.
furthermore, add ½ tsp salt and ½ tsp jaggery. mix well.
now add in roasted paneer and cook for a minute.
finally, garnish with few curry leaves and enjoy paneer ghee roast with roti or dosa.

banana rasayana | balehannu rasayana rec.name: banana rasayana | balehannu rasayana recipe
banana rasayana | balehannu rasayana rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: finely chop the bananas into small pieces and keep it aside.
take 1 cup of grated coconut and grind it to smooth paste with 1/4th cup of water. add 3-4 cardamom extract before grinding.
squeeze and extract the coconut milk from the grated coconut.
add 4- 5 tbsp of sugar and a pinch of salt to the chopped banana and mix it well.
add the extracted coconut milk to the chopped bananas and mix well.
banana rasayana is ready. serve it with neer dosa, plain dosa, tuppa dosa and pooris.

spicy buttermilk recipe | majjige huli r.name: spicy buttermilk recipe | majjige huli recipe | masala chaas recipe
spicy buttermilk recipe | majjige huli r.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: roughly chop the ginger, green chilli and coriander leaves. keep aside.
now in a small chutney blender, blend coriander leaves, ginger and chilli along with 2 tsp of thick curd / yogurt.
blend to a smooth paste.
in a large blender add 2 cups of yogurt / curd and 1Â½ cup of cold water. blend well.
combine the ground masala with blended yogurt. add some salt and give a pulse. so everything gets mixed well
for tempering, heat oil / ghee in a small pan and add mustard seeds, urad dal, cumin seeds, red chillies and hing. when the seeds crackle pour the tempering over the buttermilk.
squeeze some lemon juice. garnish with coriander and lemon.

aloo bonda recipe | batata vada recipe |.name: aloo bonda recipe | batata vada recipe | potato bonda | bonda recipe
aloo bonda recipe | batata vada recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
3 medium sized potato, boiled, peeled and mashed
Â¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat oil and add mustard seeds, jeera, crushed coriander seeds, hing and few curry leaves.
allow to splutter.
further add broken cashews and roast to golden.
additionally saute chopped onions, ginger and chilli.
furthermore add in turmeric, chilli powder, garam masala powder and salt. saute.
now add in boiled and mashed potato mix well.
additionally, add in coriander leaves and lemon juice.
prepare the besan batter.
also make a ball from the prepared aloo masala.
further, dip into besan batter and deep fry in hot oil.
fry till the bonda turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve aloo bonda along with chutney or tomato sauce.

veg bonda recipe | vegetable bonda recip.name: veg bonda recipe | vegetable bonda recipe | mixed veg bonda
veg bonda recipe | vegetable bonda recip.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, steam cook ½ potato, ½ carrot, ¼ cup beetroot, 5 beans, 2 tbsp matar.
in a kadai heat 3 tsp oil and splutter mustard, cumin, urad dal and curry leaves.
also saute 1 inch ginger, 2 clove garlic, 2 green chilli and ½ onion.
now add ½ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp chaat masala and ¼ tsp salt.
saute and mash the cooked vegetables for a minute.
add in 2 tbsp coriander, 1 tbsp lemon juice and mix well.
prepare a small sized ball from vegetable mixture.
dip in prepared besan batter and deep fry in hot oil.
finally serve veg bonda with tomato sauce or coconut chutney.

misal pav recipe | how to make maharasht.name: misal pav recipe | how to make maharashtrian misal pav recipe
misal pav recipe | how to make maharasht.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tbsp oil and splutter 1 tsp mustard, 1 tsp jeera and few curry leaves.
also add ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp coriander powder and 1 tsp garam masala.
saute on low flame till spices turn aromatic.
now add in prepared masala paste and saute well.
cook till the oil is released from masala paste.
add in cooked matki, small piece jaggery and ½ tsp salt. give a good mix.
also add 5 cup water and adjust consistency.
cover and boil for 10 minutes or till misal is cooked completely.
once the misal is cooked, oil starts to float indicating misal is ready.
in a serving plate, take matki usal add some farsan over it.
top with chopped onions and coriander leaves over it.
also pour ladleful of kat or gravy from sides.
finally, serve misal with pav and lemon wedges making a complete misal pav recipe.

oats khichdi recipe | easy and healthy o.name: oats khichdi recipe | easy and healthy oats khichdi recipe
oats khichdi recipe | easy and healthy o.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, wash and soak moong dal in water for 5 minutes.
furthermore, heat the ghee in a pressure cooker, add cumin seeds and hing.
when they sizzle, add curry leaves and ginger. saute till it turns aromatic.
additionally, add chopped onions, green chilli and saute till they change colour to pinkish.
oats khichdi
furthermore, add tomatoes and fry till they turn soft and mushy.
later add carrot and beans (or veggies of your choice) and saute for about 2 to 3 minutes.
drain the water from half cup dal and add along with turmeric. fry for about 2 to 3 minutes.
furthermore, add 1 cup of oats, salt and fry for about 2 minutes.
pour 4 cups of water. and give a mix.
you can adjust the quantity of water to make it mushy or slightly grainy. on a medium flame, pressure cook for two whistle.
finally, serve oats khichdi warm after garnishing with some coriander leaves with raita.

oats upma recipe | vegetable oats upma |.name: oats upma recipe | vegetable oats upma | oatmeal upma | oats for breakfast
oats upma recipe | vegetable oats upma |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 1 tbsp oil and splutter 1 tsp mustard, ½ tsp urad dal, ½ tsp jeera, few curry leaves and 10 cashews.
saute until the cashews turn golden brown.
now add 1 inch ginger, 2 chilli and ½ onion. saute well.
furthermore add ½ carrot, 5 beans, ¼ capsicum, 2 tbsp peas, ½ tsp turmeric and ½ tsp salt.
add 2 tbsp water, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
now add 1 cup water and get it to a boil. if using instant oats, just add ¼ cup water.
once the water comes to a boil, add in roasted oats and mix well.
mix until the oats absorb all the water.
now cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until oats gets cooked well.
furthermore add ¼ tsp salt, 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp coconut and 1 tbsp lemon juice.
finally, enjoy vegetable oats upma as a healthy breakfast or pack to the lunch box.

poha pakoda recipe | poha pakora recipe.name: poha pakoda recipe | poha pakora recipe | easy & crisp veg snack
poha pakoda recipe | poha pakora recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 cup poha / aval / avalakki / flattened rice, thin
¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, wash 1 cup thin poha with enough water. do not soak thin poha, just rinse in water.
drain off the water and rest poha for 15 minutes so that water is dropped down completely.
now transfer the washed poha into a large mixing bowl.
also add ½ onion, 1 boiled potato, ½ tsp ginger paste, 2 chilli, 2 tbsp coriander and few curry leaves.
additionally add ¼ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp ajwain, ½ tsp aamchur and ½ tsp salt.
further, add 2 tbsp peanuts and 3 tbsp besan.
mix well by mashing potato.
also, add more besan if required to form a dough.
now grease hand with oil and prepare small ball sized.
deep fry in hot oil stirring occasionally.
fry until the pakora turns golden and crisp.
finally, enjoy poha pakoda with tomato sauce.

onion chutney recipe | south indian onio.name: onion chutney recipe | south indian onion chutney for idli & dosa
onion chutney recipe | south indian onio.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ cup water, or as required
steps: firstly, add 2 tsp of oil and roast 1 tsp urad dal, 1 tsp chana dal and 4 dried kashmiri red chilli on low flame.
also add in 1 finely chopped onion.
saute the onions till they turn slightly golden in colour.
cool completely and transfer to the blender.
add in small piece tamarind, jaggery and salt to taste.
blend to smooth consistency adding Â¼ cup water, or as required.
now prepare the tempering by heating 2 tsp oil.
also add in 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tsp urad dal, pinch of hing, 1 dried red chilli and few curry leaves.
allow the tempering to splutter.
finally, pour the tempering over onion chutney and serve along with idli or dosa.

bread pakora recipe | aloo stuffed bread.name: bread pakora recipe | aloo stuffed bread pakora | bread bajji recipe
bread pakora recipe | aloo stuffed bread.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
½ cup water or as required
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 3 boiled potato.
also add 1 green chilli, 1-inch ginger, 2 tbsp coriander,¼ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp aamchur and ½ tsp chaat masala.
combine all the ingredients well and aloo stuffing is ready.
further, spread 1 tsp of green chutney over bread slice and cut half.
spread a tbsp of prepared aloo stuffing over half slice of bread.
cover with another half slice and dip into besan batter covering both sides.
deep fry immediately into hot oil.
splash oil over bread pakora and fry on medium flame flipping occasionally.
fry till the pakora turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve bread pakora with green chutney or tomato sauce.

benne dosa recipe | davanagere benne dos.name: benne dosa recipe | davanagere benne dose | butter dosa recipe
benne dosa recipe | davanagere benne dos.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 3 cup dosa rice / sona masuri rice
2 cup puffed rice / churumuri / murmura, washed & squeezed
steps: firstly in a blender blend 1 cup soaked urad dal to smooth paste adding water as required.
transfer the smooth and fluffy batter of urad dal into a large bowl.
in the blender blend 3 cup dosa rice, ½ tsp methi to slightly coarse paste adding water as required.
transfer the rice batter to the bowl of urad dal batter.
now take 2 cups washed & squeezed puffed rice in a blender.
and blend to smooth paste.
mix well making sure everything is combined well.
now cover and rest in warm place for 8-10 hours or till the batter ferments and doubles.
add 1½ tsp salt to the batter and mix well.
also, heat the griddle and pour a ladleful of batter.
spread out in a circular motion slightly thick than regular masala dosa.
also spread a tsp of oil from sides of dosa.
now add 1 tbsp of butter spreading all the sides of dosa.
roast the dosa to a golden brown on both sides.
finally, fold the benne dose / butter dosa into half and serve with chutney and aloo bhaji topped with more butter.

rava idli recipe | how to make rava idli.name: rava idli recipe | how to make rava idli | instant semolina idli
rava idli recipe | how to make rava idli.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a kadai heat 3 tsp oil and splutter 1 tsp mustard, ½ tsp jeera, 1 tsp chana dal, pinch hing and few curry leaves.
now add 1 chilli, 1 inch ginger and saute for a minute.
further add 2 tbsp carrot, ¼ tsp turmeric and saute for 2 minutes.
keeping the flame on low add 1 cup rava and roast well.
roast for 5 minutes or until the rava turns aromatic.
cool the rava completely and transfer to a bowl.
furthermore, add ¾ cup curd, 2 tbsp coriander and ½ tsp salt.
mix well forming a thick batter.
now add ½ cup water and mix well forming a smooth batter.
rest for 15 minutes or until the rava absorbs water.
mix well and add water as required, to form an idli batter consistency batter.
grease the idli plate with oil and place cashews in the centre.
just before steaming add a ¼ tsp eno (fruit salt) and mix well till it turns frothy. alternatively, add a pinch of baking soda.
pour the batter immediately into the idli plate. do not rest the batter.
steam the rava idli for 13 minutes on medium flame.
finally, serve instant rava idli with coconut chutney and sambar.

chilli paneer gravy recipe | easy paneer.name: chilli paneer gravy recipe | easy paneer chilli with gravy recipe
chilli paneer gravy recipe | easy paneer.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour / refined flour
Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, prepare corn flour batter adding spices.
further dip cubes of paneer / cottage cheese and deep fry in hot oil.
fry the paneer till they turn golden and crisp.
drain off the fried paneer onto a kitchen paper and keep aside.
prepare the the gravy by heating 4 tsp oil and saute 2 cloves garlic.
also add 2 tbsp spring onion, 2 tbsp onion and 2 green chilli. saute well.
furthermore add Â½ capsicum (green & red) and saute slightly.
additionally, add 2 tbsp vinegar, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp chilli sauce, Â¼ tsp pepper and Â¼ tsp salt.
saute on high flame till the sauce thickens.
pour the corn flour water and stir continuously.
add in fried paneer.
finally, serve chilli paneer gravy recipe garnished with few chopped spring onions along with fried rice.

gobi manchurian gravy recipe | cauliflow.name: gobi manchurian gravy recipe | cauliflower manchurian gravy recipe
gobi manchurian gravy recipe | cauliflow.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ cup maida / plain flour / refined flour
1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste / adrak-lasun ki paste
1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder
water as required, to prepare batter
2 cups gobi / cauliflower, florets - boiled 1 minute
Â½ cup spring onions, finely chopped
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take maida and corn flour.
further add ginger garlic paste, chili powder, salt and soy sauce.
add water as required and make a smooth batter.
now add in boiled gobi florets and deep fry in hot oil till they turn golden brown.
drain off the gobi over a kitchen towel to remove excess oil. keep aside.
in a large kadai heat oil and saute garlic on high flame.
further saute spring onion and capsicum.
additionally add chili sauce, tomato sauce, soy sauce, vinegar, crushed pepper and salt.
mix well and saute for a minute.
add corn flour water and stir well till they turn translucent.
additionally, add fried gobi.
mix gently making sure the sauce has coated well uniformly.
finally, transfer to a serving bowl and garnish with chopped spring onions green. serve with fried rice.

burnt garlic fried rice recipe | burnt g.name: burnt garlic fried rice recipe | burnt garlic rice | burnt garlic veg fried rice
burnt garlic fried rice recipe | burnt g.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 4 tsp oil and saute 3 cloves chopped garlic.
saute on medium flame till they turn golden and slightly burnt.
further add 2 tbsp onion, spring onions and green chilli. saute well.
additionally add ½ capsicum, 2 tbsp carrot and 2 tbsp beans. saute for a minute.
now add 2 tsp vinegar, 2 tsp soy sauce and 1 tsp chilli sauce. mix on high flame.
furthermore add 2 cups cooked basmati rice or leftover rice.
also add ½ tsp pepper and ¾ tsp salt.
mix gently, without breaking rice grain. allow the rice to heat up completely.
finally, serve burnt garlic fried rice garnished with few chopped spring onions green.

paneer popcorn recipe | paneer snacks re.name: paneer popcorn recipe | paneer snacks recipe | paneer starter recipe
paneer popcorn recipe | paneer snacks re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 11 cubes paneer.
add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp pepper, ½ tsp mixed herbs and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well making sure all the spices are coated well to paneer.
now prepare corn flour paste by taking ¼ cup corn flour, ¼ tsp pepper and ¼ tsp salt in a small bowl.
add ¼ cup water and prepare smooth lump free batter.
now dip marinated paneer into corn flour batter.
further, roll into breadcrumbs coating all the sides.
dip the coated paneer again into cornflour batter and coat with breadcrumbs (double coating)
deep fry in hot oil or bake at 180-degree celsius for 12 minutes.
stir occasionally, keeping the flame on medium.
fry till the paneer turns golden brown and crisp.
finally, drain over a kitchen towel and serve paneer popcorn with tomato sauce.

veg gold coin recipe | vegetable gold co.name: veg gold coin recipe | vegetable gold coins | chinese gold coins
veg gold coin recipe | vegetable gold co.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 boiled potato, 2 tbsp onion, 2 tbsp carrot, 2 tbsp capsicum and 1 tbsp boiled corn.
also add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, 1 green chilli, 2 tbsp coriander, ½ tsp salt and 1 tsp soy sauce.
mix well making sure everything is combined well.
now using a round shape cookie cutter or glass and cut bread slice into round pieces.
top with a tbsp of prepared aloo mixture.
coat with sesame seeds over aloo mixture.
now shallow fry in hot oil or bake at 180 degree celsius for 10 minutes.
flip over and fry till the gold coin turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve veg gold coin with tomato sauce or green chutney.

baby corn manchurian recipe | baby corn.name: baby corn manchurian recipe | baby corn manchurian dry recipe
baby corn manchurian recipe | baby corn.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ cup maida / plain flour / all-purpose flour
Â½ cup water, add as required
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take maida and corn flour.
also add ginger-garlic paste, chilli powder and salt.
now slowly add water as required.
and make a smooth flowing consistency batter.
furthermore, add chopped baby corn and coat well with batter.
then deep fry into hot oil till they turn golden brown.
dip each cooked gobi florets into the batter.
finally, drain the fried baby corn on a kitchen paper towel to remove excess oil.
firstly, in a large kadai add 2 tsp oil
furthermore, add chopped onion, spring onions, ginger and garlic. saute for a minute.
add chilli sauce, soya sauce, vinegar, salt and tomato sauce.
mix well till the sauce turns slightly thick.
now add the deep fried baby corns
also add black pepper powder and give a good mix.
finally, add some chopped spring onions greens and serve hot.

veg cutlet recipe | vegetable cutlet rec.name: veg cutlet recipe | vegetable cutlet recipe | easy veg cutlet recipe
veg cutlet recipe | vegetable cutlet rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, mash the cooked vegetables completely.
add ¼ cup breadcrumbs. you can alternatively use bread dipped in water.
additionally, add ½ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp cumin powder, ¼ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp aamchur, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, 2 tbsp coriander and ¼ tsp salt.
combine well forming a dough.
now prepare corn flour batter by mixing 3 tbsp corn flour, 2 tbsp maida, ¼ tsp pepper and ¼ tsp salt.
add ¼ cup water and prepare a smooth lump free batter.
now take a ball sized vegetable mixture and roll to cylindrical shape greasing hands with oil.
dip in corn flour batter.
now coat with crushed corn flakes/breadcrumbs.
deep fry in hot oil/bake in preheated oven at 180-degree celcius for 15-20 minutes.
stir occasionally, and fry to golden and crisp on medium flame.
finally, serve veg cutlet with tomato sauce.

turmeric milk recipe | golden milk recip.name: turmeric milk recipe | golden milk recipe | masala haldi doodh | haldi milk
turmeric milk recipe | golden milk recip.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a sauce pan take 2 cup milk. if you are vegan then you can go for coconut milk or almond milk.
add ¾ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp crushed pepper, ½ inch cinnamon, 1 inch ginger and 1 tsp coconut oil.
whisk and mix well making sure everything is well combined.
keeping the flame on low get the milk to boil.
now cool the milk slightly if you are adding honey.
add 1 tsp honey and mix well. you can alternatively use sugar for sweetness or totally avoid it.
finally, strain the milk and enjoy turmeric milk or golden milk warm.

hot chocolate recipe | homemade hot choc.name: hot chocolate recipe | homemade hot chocolate | hot cocoa mix recipe
hot chocolate recipe | homemade hot choc.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a sauce pan take 2 cup milk.
add ¼ cup cocoa powder, 2 tbsp sugar and 2 tbsp cream.
whisk continuously making sure the cocoa powder is well combined.
continue to whisk and get the milk to boil.
turn off the flame and add 1 tsp vanilla extract. mix well.
prepare whipping cream by taking 1 cup chilled whipping cream.
also add 2 tbsp powdered sugar and 1 tsp vanilla extract.
beat on low speed until the cream thickens.
after 5 minutes, the cream turns stiff peaks.
pour the hot chocolate into glass and a dollop of whipped cream.
finally, enjoy hot chocolate sprinkled with more cocoa powder.

cappuccino recipe | homemade cappuccino.name: cappuccino recipe | homemade cappuccino recipe | homemade cappuccino coffee
cappuccino recipe | homemade cappuccino.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take ¼ cup instant coffee powder, ¼ cup sugar and 3 tbsp water.
mix well dissolving sugar.
using hand beater beat the mixture. you can also beat using whisk or blender.
beat for 5 minutes or until the mixture turns frothy and lightens in colour.
make sure the mixture is thick and creamy. you can store this mixture for a week in an airtight container by refrigerating.
to prepare cappuccino, heat 2 cups of milk.
whisk and get the milk to boil to make the milk frothy.
in a cup, add 1 tbsp of cappuccino mixture.
top with a cup of frothy milk and mix gently.
to make it stronger, add a tbsp of more cappuccino mixture and mix gently.
finally, enjoy cappuccino hot with cookies.

ginger tea recipe | adrak chai | adrak w.name: ginger tea recipe | adrak chai | adrak wali chai | ginger milk tea
ginger tea recipe | adrak chai | adrak w.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a saucepan take 2 cup water.
add 1 inch ginger, 2 pods cardamom, small piece cinnamon.
get it to a boil.
now add 3 tsp tea powder and boil for 5 minutes on medium flame.
pour in ½ cup milk and 2 tsp sugar.
boil for 2 minutes until the flavours are combined. do not over boil after adding milk.
strain the tea using a tea strainer.
finally, enjoy adrak chai along with your breakfast or evening snacks.

watermelon juice recipe | tarbooz ka jui.name: watermelon juice recipe | tarbooz ka juice | tarbuj ka juice
watermelon juice recipe | tarbooz ka jui.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a blender take 2 cup watermelon, 2 tbsp mint, 2 tbsp lemon juice, ¼ tsp pepper powder and 1 tbsp sugar.
blend well and enjoy fresh watermelon juice garnished with mint.
firstly, in a tall glass take 2 tbsp crushed ice.
add 2 tbsp rooh afza, 1 cup finely chopped watermelon pieces.
pour 1 cup water, stir and enjoy watermelon rooh afza sharbat.
firstly, in a tall glass take 2 tbsp crushed ice and 2 tbsp sabja seeds.
pour in 1 cup fresh watermelon juice.
finally, pour 1 cup fresh soda or sprite and stir before serving.

mango frooti recipe | how to make frooti.name: mango frooti recipe | how to make frooti mango drink | mango fruity
mango frooti recipe | how to make frooti.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai take 2 cup ripened mango, ½ cup raw mango and ½ cup sugar.
further, add 2 cup water and stir well.
cover and boil for 10 minutes or until mangoes soften.
drain off the mango and blend to smooth paste.
sieve the pulp making sure there is no residue.
add 4 cup water and mix adjusting the consistency as required.
finally, refrigerate the mango frotti and enjoy chilled for a month.

badam milk recipe | almond milk recipe |.name: badam milk recipe | almond milk recipe | badam doodh recipe
badam milk recipe | almond milk recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ tsp cardamom powder / elachi powder
steps: firstly, soak Â¼ cup badam in hot water for 30 minutes.
peel off the skin of badam and transfer into small blender.
add in Â¼ cup milk and blend to smooth paste. keep aside.
now in a large kadai heat 2 cup milk stirring occasionally.
add in prepared badam paste.
also add few thread saffron and 3 tsp sugar. stir well.
simmer for 5 minutes or till milk thickens.
additionally, add in Â¼ tsp cardamom powder and stir well.
finally, serve badam milk or almond milk hot or chilled garnished with few saffron.

thandai recipe | sardai recipe | how to.name: thandai recipe | sardai recipe | how to make thandai for holi festival
thandai recipe | sardai recipe | how to.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a small blender take ¼ cup cashew and ¼ cup almonds.
also add 2 tbsp poppy seeds, 2 tbsp melon seeds, 1 tsp fennel seeds, 1 tsp pepper, 3 pods cardamom and 1 tbsp dried rose petals.
blend to fine powder without adding any water. thandai masala powder is ready.
now to prepare thandai drink take few cubes of ice in a glass.
add in 3 tsp of prepared thandai masala.
pour chilled milk and mix well. allow to rest for 10 minutes before serving.
finally, serve thandai garnished with few saffron threads and dried rose petals.

churumuri recipe | masala mandakki recip.name: churumuri recipe | masala mandakki recipe | spiced puffed rice recipe
churumuri recipe | masala mandakki recip.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, dry roast 2 cup churumuri on low flame until it turns crisp. you can alternatively keep under hot sunlight.
now take crispy murmura in a large mixing bowl.
add 2 tbsp coconut oil, ½ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp salt and 2 tbsp fried peanuts.
mix well making sure the spices are coated well to churumuri.
now add ½ onion, ½ tomato, 2 tbsp carrot, 2 tbsp coriander and 2 tbsp lemon juice.
mix roughly without allowing churumuri from turning soggy.
further, add 2 tbsp sev and mix roughly.
finally, enjoy churumuri or masala mandakki topped with more sev and coriander.

hara bhara kabab recipe | veg hara bhara.name: hara bhara kabab recipe | veg hara bhara kabab | veg kabab recipe
hara bhara kabab recipe | veg hara bhara.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 bunch palak leaves / spinach / baby spinach
1 green chili / hari mirch, finely chopped
Â¾ cup paneer / cottage cheese, crumbled
Â½ tsp kashmiri chili powder / lal mirch powder
Â½ tsp coriander powder / dhaniya powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat oil and add green chili.
also add capsicum and saute till the moisture disappears.
further add beans and peas. saute well.
transfer to the blender and allow to cool completely.
blend to coarse paste along with blanched palak.
transfer the blended paste into a large mixing bowl.
also add grated potato, paneer and coriander leaves.
further add corn flour and breadcrumbs.
add in the spices and salt.mix well.
grease hands with oil and make a small patties.
cover the patties with bread crumbsand garnish with cashew.
now deep fry the prepared patties into hot oil.
fry on medium hot oil, stirring occasionally.
drain the fried hara bhara kabab onto the kitchen towel.
finally, serve hara bhara kabab hot with sauce and masala tea.

aloo cutlet recipe | potato cutlet | cri.name: aloo cutlet recipe | potato cutlet | crispy alu suji cutlet
aloo cutlet recipe | potato cutlet | cri.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
2 tbsp maida / plain flour / all purpose flour
¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai take ½ cup water, 1 tsp oil and ¼ tsp salt. stir and get to a boil.
lower the flame and add ¼ cup rava stirring continuously.
transfer the cooked suji into a large mixing bowl, and cool completely.
now add 3 boiled & mashed potato.
also add ½ tsp ginger garlic paste, ¼ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp coriander powder, ¼ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp chaat masala, ½ tsp pepper, 2 tbsp coriander and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is combined well and prepare the patties
dip in corn flour batter covering both sides.
then roll in breadcrumbs on both the sides.
deep fry, shallow fry or pan fry the patties in hot oil.
finally, drain over kitchen paper to remove excess oil and serve aloo cutlet / aloo suji cutlet with tomato sauce.

rava cutlet recipe | suji cutlet recipe.name: rava cutlet recipe | suji cutlet recipe | veg sooji cutlet with leftover upma
rava cutlet recipe | suji cutlet recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: prepare the patties from upma and keep aside.
now mix ¼ cup corn flour, ¼ tsp pepper, ¼ tsp salt and ¼ cup water and prepare a smooth flowing consistency batter.
dip in corn flour batter covering both sides.
then roll in bread crumbs on both the sides.
place a whole cashew in centre and press gently.
deep fry, shallow fry or pan fry the patties in hot oil. alternatively, preheat and bake at 180 degree celsius for 25 minutes.
flip and fry both the sides on medium flame till it turns golden and crisp.
finally, drain over kitchen paper to remove excess oil and serve rava cuttlet with tomato sauce.

sabudana tikki recipe | sabudana cutlet.name: sabudana tikki recipe | sabudana cutlet recipe | sabudana patties
sabudana tikki recipe | sabudana cutlet.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ cup peanuts / groundnuts, roasted & crushed
Â¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
Â½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, take soaked sabudana in large mixing bowl
add in 1 large boiled and grated potato.
also add Â¼ cup crushed peanuts, 1 inch ginger, 1 chilli, 2 tbsp coriander leaves, Â¼ tsp cumin powder, Â½ tsp aamchur and salt to taste.
combine, mix and mash well with your hand.
now prepare small flat patties.
roast the sabudana tikki (patties) on medium hot tawa.
spread few tsp of oil, for even roasting.
flip over once one side turns golden brown.
spread oil again and roast both sides to golden and crisp.
finally, serve sabudana tikki with tomato sauce or green chutney.

gobi 65 recipe | cauliflower 65 | how to.name: gobi 65 recipe | cauliflower 65 | how to make crispy gobi fry 65
gobi 65 recipe | cauliflower 65 | how to.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 15 florets gobi and ½ tsp salt.
pour 4 cup hot water and allow to blanch for 5 minutes.
drain off the water and take blanched gobi in a large bowl.
add 2 tbsp curd, 1 tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 tsp lemon juice.
also add few curry leaves, 2 tbsp coriander, 1 tsp oil and ½ tsp salt.
mix well and allow to marinate for 30 minutes.
now add ¼ cup cornflour and ¼ cup rice flour.
mix well coating flour uniformly.
deep fry in hot oil stirring occasionally.
drain off over kitchen paper once gobi turns crispy and golden.
to prepare tempering, heat 3 tsp oil and splutter ½ tsp cumin, 1 inch ginger, 2 clove garlic, 2 dried red chilli and few curry leaves.
keep the flame on low and add 1 tbsp curd, ½ tsp chilli powder and ¼ tsp salt.
saute well until it is well combined well.
add in fried gobi and mix well coating sauce uniformly.
finally, add 2 tbsp coriander and enjoy gobi 65 for an evening snack.

bombay sandwich masala recipe | sandwich.name: bombay sandwich masala recipe | sandwich masala recipe
bombay sandwich masala recipe | sandwich.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a thick bottomed pan dry roast cumin seeds, fennel seeds, black pepper and cinnamon stick.
roast on medium flame for a minute or till turn aromatic. allow them to cool completely.
furthermore, transfer to small mixer grinder. also add chaat masala and little salt.
blend to fine powder.
finally, bombay sandwich masala is ready. use it to prepare bombay sandwich and store remaining in airtight container.

biscuit cake recipe | no bake biscuit ca.name: biscuit cake recipe | no bake biscuit cake | chocolate biscuit cake
biscuit cake recipe | no bake biscuit ca.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, break into small pieces 458 grams parle-g or any digestive biscuits / tea biscuits.
in double boiling method, melt 2/3rd cup thickened cream, Â½ cup sugar, 1 tbsp butter and whisk till butter melts completely.
additionally add Â½ cup cocoa powder and whisk smooth.
keep whisking till the mixture turns smooth and silky.
pour the prepared chocolate mixture over biscuit pieces.
add in 1 tsp vanilla extract, 5 almonds and 5 walnuts.
mix well combining everything.
transfer the mixture into 8 inch springform cake pan.
level up and press tight with the help of a spoon making sure the base is tight.
keep in refrigerator for 30 minutes, allowing to set.
meanwhile prepare the chocolate sauce by melting 150 grams dark chocolate in double boiler method.
additionally add Â½ cup thickened cream and whisk smooth.
keep whisking till the mixture turns smooth and silky.
pour the prepared chocolate sauce into prepared biscuit cake.
level out by tapping slightly.
refrigerate for 4 hours or more till the chocolate sauce sets completely.
finally, melt white chocolate and decorate the parle-g biscuit cake before serving.

rava cake recipe | semolina cake recipe.name: rava cake recipe | semolina cake recipe | suji cake or sooji cake
rava cake recipe | semolina cake recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¾ cup - 1 cup powdered sugar, adjust to sweetness
Â½ cup maida / plain flour / refined flour
Â¼ tsp cardamom powder / elachi powder
handful of dry fruits, chopped (almonds, pistachios, cashews)
steps: firstly, in a bowl take melted butter, powdered sugar.
whisk continuously, till the mixture turns silky smooth.
further add rava, maida, salt and cardamom powder.
additionally add curd and milk.
mix well and soak for 30 minutes.
also add baking powder and baking soda.
furthermore, add dry fruits and 2 tbsp tutti frutti.
mix well and transfer to cake tin.
bake the cake at 180 degree celsius or 356 degree fahrenheit for 40 minutes.
further, cool down the cake completely. also transfer the cake to cooling rack to cool faster.
finally, cut the cake and serve rava cake along with masala tea in your evening snacks.

chilli cheese sandwich recipe | grilled.name: chilli cheese sandwich recipe | grilled cheese chilli sandwich recipe
chilli cheese sandwich recipe | grilled.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl combine chopped capsicum and onion.
also grate ¾ cup of cheddar cheese or any cheese of your choice.
additionally add ½ tsp pepper, 1 tsp chaat masala and pinch of salt.
combine well and the stuffing is ready.
now spread green chutney over a bread slice.
furthermore, spread a tbsp of prepared stuffing.
cover with a bread slice spreading green chutney on both sides.
again spread prepared stuffing.
cover again with bread slice spread with green chutney. this forms 2 layer stuffing with 3 bread slices.
now grill golden or toast on tawa by spreading butter.
finally, cut half and serve chilli cheese sandwich garnished with more grated cheese.

baby corn fry recipe | baby corn 65 reci.name: baby corn fry recipe | baby corn 65 recipe | baby corn golden fry
baby corn fry recipe | baby corn 65 reci.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour
1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, boil 9 baby corn for 2 minutes or till they turn slightly soft.

further in a bowl, take ¼ cup maida, ¼ cup corn flour, ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp red chilli powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ¼ tsp pepper, ½ tsp ginger garlic paste, few curry leaves, ¼ tsp salt and 2 tsp oil.
mix well with ½ cup water to form a smooth paste.
now dip the boiled baby corn into corn - maida paste coating all sides.
deep fry in hot oil stirring occasionally till the baby corn turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve baby corn fry with tomato sauce or green chutney.

aloo kachori recipe | aloo ki kachori re.name: aloo kachori recipe | aloo ki kachori recipe | potato stuffed kachori
aloo kachori recipe | aloo ki kachori re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour / refined flour
Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
Â½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, prepare the kachori dough and rest for 20 minutes.
prepare the stuffing by heating 2 tsp oil, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander seeds and Â½ tsp fennel. saute till it turns aromatic.
now add 2 green chilli, Â½ tsp ginger paste and saute for 30 seconds.
keeping the flame on low, add spices and saute.
now add 2 boiled potato and mashed potato, Â½ tsp salt and mix well.
aloo stuffing is ready.
now pinch a small lemon sized ball and flatten it.
now scoop 2 tsp of prepared aloo stuffing and place in the centre.
get the edges together and form a bundle.
close the top by pressing and flattening.
furthermore, gently press the edges and flatten to form a poori size.
when the oil is medium hot, add prepared kachori and fry.
finally, serve aloo kachori as it is or with green chutney and fried chilli.

bread vada recipe | bread palak vada rec.name: bread vada recipe | bread palak vada recipe | palak bread vada
bread vada recipe | bread palak vada rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl break 4 slice bread into small pieces. you can alternatively crumble them in food processor.
add in Â½ cup rice flour, Â¼ cup rava and Â¾ cup curd.
also add 1 green chilli, Â½ tsp ginger garlic paste, 1 onion, 1 bunch spinach, Â½ tsp cumin, Â½ tsp chaat masala and Â½ tsp salt.
combine well making sure to squeeze and mix.
prepare a soft dough, adding water if required.
now grease hands with oil and pinch a small ball sized dough and flatten it.
deep fry in hot oil or bake them in preheated oven at 180 degree celsius for 25 minutes or till it turns golden and crisp.
stir occasionally, and fry on medium flame till it turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve bread palak vada with coconut chutney or tomato sauce.

karasev recipe | kara sev recipe | besan.name: karasev recipe | kara sev recipe | besan sev recipe
karasev recipe | kara sev recipe | besan.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup besan and Â½ cup rice flour.
add in Â½ tsp cumin, Â¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp crushed pepper, pinch of hing and 1 tbsp butter and Â½ tsp salt. combine well.
now add Â¼ cup water (or as required) and prepare smooth dough. the dough will be slightly sticky, thats normal.
grease the large holed mould with some oil and stuff dough into it.
further, press and spread the sev in hot oil forming a circle in the oil and make sure you do not overlap.
after a minute, flip over and fry the other side.
finally, drain over kitchen paper to absorb oil and repeat making more khara sev with the remaining dough.

maddur vada recipe | maddur vade recipe.name: maddur vada recipe | maddur vade recipe | crispy maddur vada
maddur vada recipe | maddur vade recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour
Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
water as required, to make dough
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup rice flour, Â½ cup rava and Â¼ cup maida.
also add 2 chilli, 2 tbsp coriander leaves, few curry leaves, pinch of hing, Â½ tsp chilli powder, 1 onion and Â½ tsp salt.
combine well making sure the spices gets mixed well.
now heat 2 tbsp oil and pour over prepared flour mixture.
roughly mix with the help of spoon and later squeeze & crumble with hand.
pour Â¼ cup of water and combine well.
add more water as required and prepare soft dough.
grease hands with oil and pinch small ball sized dough.
prepare ball and flatten over greased palm. alternatively use greased plastic sheet / banana leaf or butter paper.
deep fry in hot oil. make sure not to over crowd the oil.
stir occasionally keeping the flame on medium.
fry till the maddur vada turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve maddur vada / maddur vade with coconut chutney / green chutney.

cauliflower pakoda recipe | gobhi ke pak.name: cauliflower pakoda recipe | gobhi ke pakode | gobi pakora
cauliflower pakoda recipe | gobhi ke pak.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai boil 3 cup water with ½ tsp salt.
add 15 florets cauliflower and boil for 2 minutes.
drain off the gobi and keep aside.

in a bowl prepare masala paste by adding 1 tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp garam masala, ¼ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp pepper, ½ tsp ginger garlic paste, 1 tsp lemon juice and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure all the spices are well combined.
further, add in blanched gobi and mix well.
coat the spice paste uniformly. marinate for 15 minutes allowing spices to absorb.
meanwhile, prepare besan batter by taking 1 cup besan, 2 tbsp rice flour, ½ tsp ajwain, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, pinch baking soda and ½ tsp salt.
add ½ cup water and mix to a smooth lump free batter.
dip the marinated gobi in besan batter and deep fry in hot oil.
stir occasionally, until the gobi turns golden brown and crisp.
finally, cauliflower pakoda / gobhi ke pakode tastes great with green chutney.

gobi manchurian recipe | how to make gob.name: gobi manchurian recipe | how to make gobi manchurian dry recipe
gobi manchurian recipe | how to make gob.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 4 tsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic,1 inch ginger and 1 green chilli on high flame.
also, saute ¼ onion and 2 tbsp spring onion on high flame.
further add ½ capsicum and continue to saute till they slightly change colour.
additionally add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1 tsp chilli sauce, 2 tsp vinegar, 2 tsp soy sauce, ¼ tsp pepper and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well and saute for a minute.
add cornflour slurry.
give a good mix until the gravy slightly thickens and turns translucent.
additionally, add fried gobi.
mix gently making sure the sauce has coated well uniformly.
finally, transfer gobi manchurian to a serving bowl and garnish with chopped spring onions green. serve with fried rice.

mushroom 65 recipe | mushroom pakora | m.name: mushroom 65 recipe | mushroom pakora | mushroom pakoda
mushroom 65 recipe | mushroom pakora | m.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup besan and Â¼ cup rice flour.
also add Â½ tsp chilli powder, Â½ tsp chaat masala, Â¼ tsp ajwain, Â½ tsp ginger garlic paste, pinch of hing and Â½ tsp salt.
add in Â½ cup water and whisk smooth.
make a smooth batter without forming any lumps.
also add a pinch of baking soda and mix gently. do not over mix as baking soda will loose its property.
make sure the batter is flowing consistency.
dip the small mushroom into prepared besan batter and coat it completely.
furthermore, deep fry in hot oil.
also stir occasionally and fry on both sides.
further, fry the mushroom till they turn golden brown.
finally, mushroom pakoda recipe is ready to serve.

paneer 65 recipe | paneer fry recipe | h.name: paneer 65 recipe | paneer fry recipe | how to make hotel style paneer 65
paneer 65 recipe | paneer fry recipe | h.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 1 tsp cumin, 1 dried red chilli and few curry leaves.
further add 3 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 1 chilli. saute on high flame.
additionally add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1 tsp chilli sauce and ¼ tsp salt. stir fry on high flame.
keeping the flame on low add 2 tbsp water and 2 tbsp curd.
mix well until the curd combines well.
optionally add 2 drops food colour for bright red colour and mix well.
now add in fried paneer and give a good mix.
finally, garnish paneer 65 with chopped coriander leaves and enjoy.

veg noodles recipe | vegetable noodles |.name: veg noodles recipe | vegetable noodles | how to make noodles recipe
veg noodles recipe | vegetable noodles |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large vessel take 6 cup water, 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp oil.
once the water comes to a boil place a pack of hakka noodles (125 gm)
boil the noodles for 3 minutes or till it turns al dente. refer package instructions to know the exact cooking time.
drain off the water from noodles and pour 1 cup of cold water to prevent from further cooking.
drizzle 1 tsp oil and mix gently, to avoid noodles from sticking to each other. keep aside.
now in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 1 chilli.
saute ½ onion, 2 tbsp spring onion on high flame.
further add ½ carrot, ¼ green capsicum, 5 snow pea, 5 beans, chopped, ¼ red capsicum and 5 florets broccoli.
stir fry on high flame for 2 minutes or until veggies are cooked yet retain their crunch.
also add 3 tbsp cabbage and stir fry.
further add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp chilli sauce, ¼ tsp pepper powder and ½ tsp salt.
stir fry until sauces are well combined.
add in boiled noodles and mix gently.
toss and mix until noodles are cooked completely.
finally, garnish with spring onion and enjoy veg noodles.

noodles frankie recipe | noodles kathi r.name: noodles frankie recipe | noodles kathi roll | schezwan noodles frankie
noodles frankie recipe | noodles kathi r.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, heat kadai with 3 tsp oil and saute 1 tbsp spring onion.
also, saute ¼ capsicum and 1 cup cabbage till they cook slightly.
now add 2 tsp schezwan sauce and ¼ tsp salt. saute for a minute.
add in cooked noodles and mix gently coating well with sauce.
further, add 2 tbsp spring onions and give a good mix. keep aside.
now heat a tawa with ½ tsp butter and warm up chapathi.
spread 1 tsp schezwan sauce and 1 tsp tomato sauce over chapathi.
place handful of noodles in centre of chapathi.
sprinkle some chaat masala.
now roll tight making sure the stuffing is intact.
wrap the roti in an aluminium foil or butter paper.
finally, serve schezwan noodles frankie or pack to kids lunch box.

cheese masala toast recipe | spicy masal.name: cheese masala toast recipe | spicy masala toast recipe
cheese masala toast recipe | spicy masal.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tsp oil and saute ½ onion, and 1 green chilli.
also saute 1 tomato for a minute.
also saute ¼ capsicum, 2 tbsp corn and ½ carrot.
cover and cook for 5 minutes or till vegetables turn soft yet crunchy.
now add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp chaat masala, ¼ tsp pepper and ¼ tsp salt. saute well.
further add 2 tbsp tomato sauce and mix well.
finally add 2 tbsp coriander and mix well. masala is ready.
spread ½ tsp of butter of each side of bread and toast golden.
flip over and spread 1 tsp green chutney over toasted side of bread.
also spread a tbsp of prepared masala over bread.
grate 3 tbsp of cheddar cheese over the masala.
cover and simmer for 2 minutes or till cheese melts.
finally, cut the cheese masala toast into half and serve.

paneer tikka roll recipe | paneer tikka.name: paneer tikka roll recipe | paneer tikka kathi roll | paneer tikka frankie
paneer tikka roll recipe | paneer tikka.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
Â¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
Â¼ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
Â½ tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves
8 tsp mint mayonnaise or green chutney
4 tsp cheese and chilli sandwich spread or cheese
steps: firstly, prepare the marination by mixing all the ingredients listed for paneer tikka and marinate for 1 hour.
roast the marinated paneer and with oil.
now prepare the wrap by warming leftover chapathi with Â¼ tsp butter.
spread 2 tsp mint mayonnaise or green chutney.
place prepared paneer tikka in one side along with a tbsp of shredded cabbage.
also add a dollop of cheese and chilli sandwich spread or grate cheddar cheese.
now roll tight and wrap the roti in a foil or butter paper.
finally, serve paneer tikka kathi roll or pack to kids lunch box.

veg pulao recipe | vegetable pulao | how.name: veg pulao recipe | vegetable pulao | how to make veg pulav in cooker
veg pulao recipe | vegetable pulao | how.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai, heat 2 tbsp ghee and saute 1 tsp cumin, 1 star anise, 1 inch cinnamon, 4 cloves, 3 pods cardamom, 1 bay leaf and 10 cashews.
also, saute 1 onion followed by 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 2 chilli.
furthermore, add 1 tomato and saute until tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
next, add 1 potato, 3 tbsp peas, 1 carrot, 10 florets cauliflower and 5 beans. saute for 2 minutes.
add 12 cubes paneer, 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint, ½ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp salt. saute for a minute.
furthermore, add 1 cup basmati rice (soaked for 20 minutes) and saute gently.
now add 2 cup water, 1 tsp lemon juice and stir well.
cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles or till the rice gets cooked completely.
finally, serve veg pulao along with onion tomato raita.

dhokla in microwave | instant dhokla rec.name: dhokla in microwave | instant dhokla recipe | microwave gujarati dhokla
dhokla in microwave | instant dhokla rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup besan, 2 tbsp rava and ¼ tsp turmeric.
also add ½ tsp ginger paste, pinch hing, 1 tsp sugar, 2 tsp oil and ¼ tsp salt.
add ½ cup water and make a smooth lump free batter.
allow to rest for 10 minutes later add a tsp of eno fruit salt to batter.
mix gently till the batter turns frothy and light.
transfer the dhokla batter immediately to greased tray.
place in microwave and turn on for 5 minutes on high power.
cut the dhokla into square pieces or shape of your choice.
pour the tempering immediately over the dhokla making sure it absorbs completely.
further sprinkle 2 tbsp coconut and 1 tbsp coriander.
finally, serve soft and spongy dhokla with green chutney or as it is.

idli podi recipe | milagai podi recipe |.name: idli podi recipe | milagai podi recipe | idli milagai podi | gunpowder recipe
idli podi recipe | milagai podi recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 3 tsp oil, sesame oil / coconut oil / vegetable oil
1 tsp ghee / clarified butter or sesame oil or gingerly oil or coconut oil
steps: firstly, in a heavy bottomed pan add sesame seeds and dry roast till they turn golden brown.
keep aside.
further, add 2 tsp oil and fry dried red chilli till they puff up.
also add few curry leaves and continue to sautÃ© till they turn crisp.
keep aside and allow to cool.
furthermore, add a tsp more oil and saute chana dal and urad dal till they turn golden brown.
transfer to a blender and blend to coarse powder.
firstly, in a tawa or pan take a tsp of ghee or sesame oil.
once the ghee melts, coat leftover idli.
warm the idlis both the side by flipping occasionally.
further add prepared podi / gun powder.
toss and coat the idlis with podi both sides.
fry the idli for a minute, making sure the idli get warm up inside as well.
finally, serve idli podi recipe / milagai podi recipe immediately or to kids lunch box.

mango dal recipe | mamidikaya pappu | ra.name: mango dal recipe | mamidikaya pappu | raw mango pappu recipe
mango dal recipe | mamidikaya pappu | ra.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ raw mango, pealed and chopped - adjust the quantity depending on sourness
1 tsp red chilli powder, adjust depending on your spice level
1 cup toor dal, cooked with 2Â½ cup water
steps: peal the skin of raw mango and chop into small pieces. adjust the quantity of mangoes based on sourness.
in a large kadai, take chopped mangoes along with a cup of water.
also add turmeric powder, green chill and few curry leaves.
cover the kadai and cook for 5 minutes or till mangoes turn soft. mangoes should retain their shape; do not over cook the mangoes.
now add a tsp of chilli powder, pinch of turmeric powder and salt to taste.
mix well and make sure there are no lumps of chilli powder formed.
add cooked dal and give a good mix. make sure the dal is thick so add less water and pressure cook. else your dal will be watery.
add water if required and get to a thick dal consistency. boil for 3 minutes.
prepare the tempering. add a tbsp of ghee, along with mustard seeds, hing and red chilli. allow to splutter.
pour the tempering to mango dal.
serve mango dal / mango pappu / mamidikaya pappu with hot steamed rice.

masala papad recipe | masala papadum rec.name: masala papad recipe | masala papadum recipe
masala papad recipe | masala papadum rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 medium onion, finely chopped or Â½ cup finely chopped onion
1 medium tomato, finely chopped or Â½ cup finely chopped tomatoes
1 tsp lime or lemon juice or add as requried
enough oil for shallow frying papads
steps: take the papad. optionally if you do not have large one, use smaller one.
heat oil for deep frying in a pan and slid the papad into the hot oil.
fry for some seconds till the papad is crisp.
with a tong remove the papad from the oil.
place the fried papad on a paper mapkin towel so that excess oil is absorbed.
place the papad in a plate and add finely chopped onion and tomato on top of the papad
sprinkle chilli powder and salt on top of the papad
squeeze the lemon on top of papad
sprinkle chopped coriander leaves.
and finally, add nylon or fine sev on top of the papad
serve masala papad immediately or else they turn soggy.

pizza bread recipe | bread pizza recipe.name: pizza bread recipe | bread pizza recipe with instant pizza sauce
pizza bread recipe | bread pizza recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a small bowl take ¼ cup tomato sauce, 1 tsp chilli sauce, ½ tsp chilli flakes and ½ tsp mixed herbs.
mix well making sure everything is well combined. pizza sauce is ready. keep aside.
take a bread slice and spread 2 tsp of prepared pizza sauce. you can alternatively use store brought pizza sauce.
top with few capsicum, tomato, onion, sweet corn, olives and jalapeno.
also spread generous amount of mozzarella cheese. you can use cheese of your choice.
now sprinkle, chilli flakes and mixed herbs.
place the bread slice over tawa brushed with generous amount of butter.
cover and cook for 2 minutes on low to medium flame until the cheese melts.
finally, enjoy bread pizza sliced into half.

chegodilu recipe | chakodi recipe | chek.name: chegodilu recipe | chakodi recipe | chekodi or kadboli | andhra ring murukku
chegodilu recipe | chakodi recipe | chek.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai take 1 cup water.
add ½ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, ¼ tsp ajwain, 2 tbsp sesame seeds, pinch hing, 1 tsp ghee and ¾ tsp salt.
mix well and get the water to a boil.
now add 1 cup rice flour and mix well.
mix until all the water is absorbed.
transfer the mixture to a large mixing bowl.
wet your hand with water and start to knead.
be careful as the flour mixture will be hot.
knead until a soft dough is formed.
now pinch a ball sized dough and roll gently.
roll to a thick rope greasing the board with oil.
you can adjust the thickness by rolling gently.
cut into pieces and join the ends.
deep fry in hot oil keeping the flame on medium.
stir occasionally, making sure to fry on low to medium flame.
fry until it turns golden and crisp. takes approximately 10 minutes.
drain off over kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
finally, enjoy chegodilu by storing in an airtight container for a month.

aloo ke kabab recipe | alu kabab recipe.name: aloo ke kabab recipe | alu kabab recipe | potato kebab | aloo k kebab
aloo ke kabab recipe | alu kabab recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
1 cup panko bread crumbs, for coating
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 3 potato, ½ onion, 1 chilli and ½ tsp ginger paste.
also add ½ tsp aamchur, ½ tsp chaat masala, ½ tsp pepper powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp cumin powder and ¼ tsp chilli powder.
further add 2 tbsp mint, 2 tbsp coriander and ¾ tsp salt.
mix well making sure all the spices are well combined.
now add ¼ cup bread crumbs and mix well.
make sure a soft dough is formed. add more bread crumbs or cornflour if the mixture is loose.
now prepare the slurry by taking 2 tbsp cornflour, 2 tbsp maida, ¼ tsp pepper powder and ½ tsp salt.
add ½ cup water and prepare a smooth lump-free batter.
further pinch a small ball sized aloo kabab mixture and give a diamond shape or shape of your choice.
dip in slurry coating uniformly.
now roll in panko bread crumbs to have a crispy outer coating.
shallow fry in hot oil keeping the flame on medium.
flip over and fry on both sides until it turns golden brown.
drain off over kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
finally, enjoy aloo kabab recipe with tomato sauce or green chutney.

beetroot vadai recipe | beetroot masala.name: beetroot vadai recipe | beetroot masala vada | chettinad beetroot lentil fritters
beetroot vadai recipe | beetroot masala.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take ½ cup chana dal, ½ cup toor dal and 2 dried red chilli.
add enough water and soak for 2 hours.
drain off the dal making sure the water is drained completely.
now transfer the drained dal to the mixi and blend to a coarse paste. pulse and blend to have a coarse texture.
add 1 cup beetroot, ½ onion, 3 tbsp coriander, 2 chilli, ½ tsp ginger paste, few curry leaves, 1 tsp cumin, pinch hing and ¾ tsp salt.
squeeze and mix well until the dal is well combined with everything.
make a soft dough adding 2 tbsp of rice flour if the mixture is watery.
grease hands with oil and prepare small balls, flatten the vada.
and deep fry in hot oil. or preheat and bake at 180 degree celcius for 25 minutes or until it turns golden and crisp.
also, stir occasionally till until the dal vada turns golden and crisp.
finally, serve beetroot vadai hot along with masala chai.

aloo paneer tikki recipe | paneer potato.name: aloo paneer tikki recipe | paneer potato cutlet | paneer alu tikkis
aloo paneer tikki recipe | paneer potato.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 2 potato boiled & mashed potato.
add 1 chilli, ½ tsp ginger garlic paste, 2 tbsp coriander, ¼ cup cornflour and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined.
now in another bowl take 1¼ cup paneer.
add ½ tsp ginger garlic paste, ½ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp chaat masala.
also, add 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined. paneer stuffing is ready.
grease your hand with oil and pinch a ball sized aloo mixture.
flatten slightly making sure there is enough space.
now place a small ball sized prepared paneer stuffing in the centre.
wrap and seal the stuffing well.
now flatten slightly forming tikki.
heat oil in a pan and shallow fry on medium flame.
flip over once the base turns golden brown.
fry both sides until it turns golden brown and crisp.
finally, enjoy aloo paneer tikki with tomato sauce and green chutney.

corn vada recipe | sweet corn vada | swe.name: corn vada recipe | sweet corn vada | sweet corn garelu
corn vada recipe | sweet corn vada | swe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a small blender take 1½ sweet corn. you can use fresh or frozen sweet corn.
blend to a coarse paste without adding any water.
transfer the corn paste to a large bowl.
add 2 tbsp carrot, ½ onion, 1 chilli, 1 inch ginger, few curry leaves and 2 tbsp coriander.
also add ¼ tsp turmeric, ¼ cup besan, ¼ cup rice flour and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined.
squeeze and mix forming a soft dough.
now grease hands with oil and pinch a ball sized dough.
flatten slightly forming a vada.
deep fry in hot oil stirring occasionally.
fry on medium flame until the vada turns golden brown and crisp.
drain off the vada onto the kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
finally, enjoy sweet corn vada with green chutney.

suji snacks recipe | twister sooji snack.name: suji snacks recipe | twister sooji snack | suji ke snacks | tea time sooji snack
suji snacks recipe | twister sooji snack.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 1½ cup rava. make sure to take fine rava.
add ½ tsp pepper powder, ½ tsp chilli flakes, ½ tsp chaat masala, 1 tsp kasuri methi, ½ tsp salt and 2 tbsp oil.
mix well making sure the flour is moist.
now add ½ cup water or as required and start to knead the dough.
knead to a smooth and soft dough adding water as required.
now grease the dough with a tsp of oil and rest for 20 minutes.
knead the dough again making sure the suji has absorbed water and dough is soft.
pinch a small ball sized dough and roll to cylindrical.
press it on back of fork and roll gently forming a spiral shape.
deep fry the snack in hot oil keeping the flame on medium.
stir occasionally, frying uniformly on all sides.
fry until the suji snack turns golden and crisp.
finally, enjoy suji snacks with hot tea or store in an airtight container for 2 weeks.

batata vada recipe | aloo vada recipe |.name: batata vada recipe | aloo vada recipe | potato vada | aloo batata wada
batata vada recipe | aloo vada recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½  tsp  kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a kadai heat 2 tsp oil and splutter 1 tsp cumin, pinch hing, 1 chilli, 3 clove garlic and few curry leaves.
also, add ¼ tsp turmeric and saute slightly.
now add 3 boiled and mashed potato and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined.
further, add 1 tsp lemon juice and 2 tbsp coriander.
mix well making sure everything is well combined.
prepare besan batter by sieving 2 cup besan and 2 tbsp rice flour.
also, add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, pinch hing and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined.
further, add ¾ cup water or as required and whisk to a smooth lump-free batter.
add ¼ tsp baking soda and mix well forming a smooth batter.
now take a small ball sized aloo mixture and flatten slightly.
dip in besan batter coating uniformly.
deep fry in hot oil carefully.
stir occasionally, until the batata vada turns golden and crisp.
drain off over kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
finally, enjoy batata vada with dry garlic chutney or as vada pav.

corn sandwich recipe | corn cheese sandw.name: corn sandwich recipe | corn cheese sandwich | grilled sweet corn sandwich
corn sandwich recipe | corn cheese sandw.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ cup cheddar / mozzarella cheese, grated
steps: firstly, in a small mixing bowl take ¾ cup boiled sweet corn.
also add 2 tbsp capsicum, 2 tbsp onion, ¼ cup cheese, ½ tsp pepper and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well combining all the ingredients well. keep aside.
now spread green chutney over a bread slice.
furthermore, spread 2 tbsp of prepared corn cheese stuffing.
cover again with bread slice spread with green chutney.
now grill golden or toast on tawa by spreading butter.
finally, cut half and serve corn cheese sandwich recipe.

tri colour sandwich recipe | easy & quic.name: tri colour sandwich recipe | easy & quick layered sandwich recipes for kids
tri colour sandwich recipe | easy & quic.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, cut the sides of 3 white or wholemeal bread. use sides to prepare bread crumbs by just grinding into fine powder.
now on one bread slice, apply generous amount of green chutney.
layer it with lettuce leaves for green layer. alternatively use sliced cucumber for green layers.
followed by a cheese slice and crushed black pepper.
further, place another slice of bread to get white layer.
now spread mayonnaise sauce generously. alternatively, use butter if required.
and spread grated carrot forming the orange layer.
also season with some salt and crushed black pepper.
place the third bread slice and press gently.
cut the sandwich into half forming triangle.
finally, serve tiranga sandwich or three layered sandwich to kids in their snack box.

sambar powder recipe | homemade sambar m.name: sambar powder recipe | homemade sambar masala podi recipe
sambar powder recipe | homemade sambar m.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ cup coriander seeds / dhaniya seeds
handful of curry leaves / kadi patta
20 whole kashmiri red chilli / lal mirch, adjust to your spice level
steps: firstly, in a thick bottomed pan add Â½ cup of coriander seeds.
dry roast on low flame till they turn aromatic.
keep aside and allow to cool completely.
further, add 2 tbsp toor dal, 2 tbsp chana dal, 2 tbsp urad dal, 1 tbsp cumin seeds and Â¼ tsp methi.
dry roast on low flame till they turn aromatic.
transfer to the same mixer and keep aside.
additionally, dry roast mustard seeds, till they splutter.
again transfer and keep aside.
now, add in handful of curry leaves, 1 tsp black pepper and 20 whole kashmiri red chilli.
dry roast on low flame till the chillis puff up and curry leaves turn crisp.
also add in 1 tsp turmeric and Â¼ tsp hing.
dry roast just for 2-3 seconds till they turn aromatic.
transfer to the blender and allow to cool completely.
now blend to fine and smooth powder.
finally, sambar powder is ready, store in a air tight container and use to prepare sambar recipes.

biryani masala recipe | how to make home.name: biryani masala recipe | how to make homemade biryani masala powder
biryani masala recipe | how to make home.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tbsp caraway seeds / kala jeera / shah jeera
steps: firstly, in a thick bottomed pan dry roast 3 red chilli and 7 bay leaf till they turn crisp. keep aside.
further dry roast 2 tbsp coriander seeds, 1 tbsp cumin and 1 tbsp caraway seeds till they turn aromatic. keep aside.
also dry roast 3 mace, 2 inch cinnamon stick, 1 nutmeg, 1 tsp cloves, 3 black cardamom, 3 star anise, 10 cardamom, 1 tbsp pepper and 1 tsp fennel / saunf.
transfer to a blender and allow to cool completely.
also add in Â½ tsp turmeric.
blend to fine powder and transfer to the airtight container.
finally, store biryani masala powder in airtight container and use to prepare biryani.

potato nuggets recipe | spicy potato nug.name: potato nuggets recipe | spicy potato nuggets | potato snacks recipes
potato nuggets recipe | spicy potato nug.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 potato, 3 tbsp cheddar cheese, Â½ tsp ginger garlic paste, Â½ tsp chilli flakes, Â½ tsp mixed herbs, Â¼ tsp pepper, Â½ tsp chaat masala, Â¼ tsp salt and 2 tbsp coriander leaves.
mix well making sure the spices are combined well.
now add Â¼ cup bread crumbs and combine well. breadcrumbs helps to absorb moisture and prevent from breaking in oil.
further prepare corn flour batter by mixing Â¼ cup corn flour, Â¼ tsp pepper, Â¼ tsp salt and Â¼ cup water.
prepare a smooth flowing consistency batter.
pinch a small ball sized potato dough and roll to cylindrical shape.
dip in corn flour batter covering all sides.
then roll in bread crumbs.
deep fry, shallow fry or pan fry the patties in hot oil. alternatively, preheat and bake at 180 degree celsius for 25 minutes.
flip and fry all the sides on medium flame till it turns golden and crisp.
finally, drain over kitchen paper to remove excess oil and serve potato nuggets with tomato sauce.

mango chutney recipe | green mango chutn.name: mango chutney recipe | green mango chutney | mango chutney sauce
mango chutney recipe | green mango chutn.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a heavy bottomed kadai heat oil.
add in 5-6 red chilli, 1 tbsp channa dal, Â½ tbsp urad dal, Â½ tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp coriander seeds and Â¼ tsp methi.
roast in low flame for 2 minutes or till the spices turn aromatic.
transfer to the blender.
also add in 1 cup raw mango, 3 cloves garlic and salt to taste.
blend to coarse paste without adding any water. keep aside.
now heat oil in the same kadai.
once the oil is hot, add in 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1 dried red chilli and few curry leaves. allow to splutter.

saute on low flame for 2 minutes.

ginger chutney recipe | allam chutney re.name: ginger chutney recipe | allam chutney recipe | allam pachadi recipe
ginger chutney recipe | allam chutney re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tbsp urad dal / split black lentils
handful of curry leaves / kadi patta
Â¼ cup ginger / adrak, peeled & chopped
steps: firstly, soak tamarind in hot water for 10 minutes and squeeze to remove juice.
further, in a thick bottomed pan heat oil.
add 1Â½ tbsp chana dal, 1 tbsp urad dal, Â¼ tsp mustard seeds and Â¼ tsp methi seeds.
roast for a minute on low flame.
additionally add 4-7 red chilli, curry leaves and peeled Â¼ cup ginger.
continue to saute on low flame till the raw smell from ginger disappears.
transfer the mixture to the blender.

blend to smooth paste adding more water if required.

allow to splutter.

banana chutney recipe | raw banana curd.name: banana chutney recipe | raw banana curd chutney recipe | pachadi recipe
banana chutney recipe | raw banana curd.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 medium size raw banana / baalekai / aratikaya
1 cup of curd / yogurt, fresh and thick
steps: firstly, pressure cook raw banana along with salt and water for 3 whistles.
once the banana has cooked, remove and peel the skin.
mash smooth the cooked raw banana when they are still warm.
meanwhile, heat 3 tsp of oil in a pan.
when the oil is hot add mustard seeds, hing and curry leaves.
saute well and allow to splutter.
furthermore, add ginger, chilli and onions.
and saute till they turn slightly golden brown.
transfer the tempering over mashed raw banana.
add fresh curd / yogurt only after bandana has cooled completely.
also add salt to taste and coriander leaves.
mix well making sure everything is combined well.

mini idli recipe| bullet idli recipe.name: mini idli recipe| bullet idli recipe
mini idli recipe| bullet idli recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 cup idli rava - cream of rice
1 cup urad dal/spilt & skinned black gram lentils
steps: firstly, soak the urad dal in enough water for 4-5 hours.
furthermore, drain the water from the urad dal and keep it aside.
take the urad dal in the wet grinder / mixer. add some of the urad dal strained water and grind.
however, if the batter appears too thick, add some water. grind to a smooth batter.
after that pour in a non reactive deep pan or pot.
furthermore, rinse the idli rava till the water runs clear of the starch.
drain the water well from idli rava by squeezing excess water from idli rava.
mix the squeezed idli rava to the batter well.
make sure there are enough space for batter to raise when fermented.
cover and ferment in warm place for atleast 6 - 8 hours.
you can see the batter has raised slightly indicating its well fermented.
mix the batter slightly and add salt to taste.
brush idli moulds with oil.
pour the batter in the idli moulds.
additionally, place the idli stand in the steamer containing with some boiling water.
furthermore, cover with a lid and steam the idlis for 10 minutes.
finally, arrange the mini idlis then add more sambar on top.

banana smoothie recipe | dates & chocola.name: banana smoothie recipe | dates & chocolate smoothie | weight loss recipes
banana smoothie recipe | dates & chocola.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

blend smooth making sure dry fruits and blended well.

firstly, in a blender take 1 ripened banana.

nimbu paani recipe | fresh lime juice re.name: nimbu paani recipe | fresh lime juice recipe | nimbu or limbu sharbat
nimbu paani recipe | fresh lime juice re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

squeeze in Â½ lemon juice.

firstly, take 7 ice cubes in a jar.

pour in 1 glass cold soda water and mix well.

grape juice recipe | grapefruit juice re.name: grape juice recipe | grapefruit juice recipe | homemade black grape juice
grape juice recipe | grapefruit juice re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large vessel take 2 cups of grapes.
further add a cup of water.
and get the grapes to boil.
stir occasionally, for uniform cooking of grapes.
further boil for 5 minutes or till grapes turn soft.
mash the grapes slightly, and check if the grapes are cooked well.
cool the mixture completely.
and mash with the potato masher or squeeze the pulp with your hand.
filter the mixture and extract the grape juice.
squeeze well to get enough pulp from the grape mixture.
transfer the extracted grape juice to the large vessel.
also add Â¼ cup sugar and mix well.
boil the syrup for 2 minutes.
and further turn off the flame and squeeze lemon juice.
cool completely before storing the grape syrup.
once cooled, transfer to the large glass jar and can store in refrigerator for atleast 6 months.
to prepare the grape juice, take ice cubes in glass jar.

also add 1 cup of water.
and add few chopped fresh grapes.
mix well, adjust the concentration depending on your choice.
finally, serve grape juice chilled garnished with a mint leaves.

buttermilk recipe | spiced buttermilk re.name: buttermilk recipe | spiced buttermilk recipe | chaas masala recipe
buttermilk recipe | spiced buttermilk re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

steps: firstly, in a blender take mint leaves, coriander leaves, green chilli and ginger.

and blend frothy.

veg spring rolls recipe | vegetarian spr.name: veg spring rolls recipe | vegetarian spring rolls recipe | spring roll recipe

steps: firstly, in a large kadai add oil along with finely chopped ginger and garlic.

saute them for a minute or till the raw smell disappears.

mix everything well.

mix well and keep aside.

create crease and roll further.
at last, apply maida paste around the corners and seal the edges.

mango lassi recipe | aam ki lassi recipe.name: mango lassi recipe | aam ki lassi recipe | mango lassi drink

matar pulao recipe | peas pulao recipe |.name: matar pulao recipe | peas pulao recipe | green peas pulao recipe
matar pulao recipe | peas pulao recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

capsicum rice recipe | capsicum pulao re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

schezwan rice recipe | triple schezwan f.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

and saute for a minute.

mix gently, and add spring onions.

mix well and saute for a minute.

mango milkshake recipe | fresh mango sha.name: mango milkshake recipe | fresh mango shake | how to make mango shake
mango milkshake recipe | fresh mango sha.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

masala soda recipe | masala nimbu soda |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

bhindi rava fry recipe | crispy okra rav.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

Â½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, wash the bhindi and wipe off clean, cut the head and tail.

masala vada recipe | masala vadai | paru.name: masala vada recipe | masala vadai | paruppu vadai | chattambade recipe

and deep fry in hot oil.

palak chakli recipe | palak murukku reci.name: palak chakli recipe | palak murukku recipe | spinach murukku
palak chakli recipe | palak murukku reci.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tbsp roasted chana dal / roasted bengal gram / putani, powdered
Â¼ cup water, or as required to knead
steps: firstly, prepare the palak puree by blending handful of palak, 2 green chilli and Â¼ cup water.
blend to smooth paste and keep aside.

chilli paneer recipe | paneer chilli dry.name: chilli paneer recipe | paneer chilli dry | how to make cheese chilli
chilli paneer recipe | paneer chilli dry.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a small bowl take ¼ cup corn flour and 2 tbsp maida.

form a smooth lump free batter adding ¼ cup water.
now dip 12 cubes paneer and coat uniformly.
deep fry in hot oil making sure the flame is on medium.
stir occasionally until the paneer cubes turn golden brown and crisp.
drain off the fried paneer and keep aside.
in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 chilli and 2 tbsp spring onion.

now add ¼ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp pepper powder and ¼ tsp salt.
stir fry until the sauce is combined well.
prepare the corn flour slurry by mixing 1 tsp corn flour in 2 tbsp water.
pour the cornflour slurry into the wok and mix continuously.
stir fry until the sauce turns glossy and thickens.
add in fried paneer and 2 tbsp spring onion. mix well.
finally, enjoy chilly paneer with fried rice.

schezwan paneer recipe | paneer schezwan.name: schezwan paneer recipe | paneer schezwan | schezwan chilli paneer
schezwan paneer recipe | paneer schezwan.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 1 green chilli on high flame.
also, saute ¼ onion and 2 tbsp spring onion on high flame.
further, add ¼ capsicum and continue to saute till they slightly change colour.
additionally add 2 tbsp schezwan sauce, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp soy sauce, ¼ tsp sugar and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well and saute for a minute.
add cornflour slurry. to prepare corn flour water mix 2 tsp of corn flour with ¼ cup of water.
give a good mix until the gravy slightly thickens and turns glossy.
additionally, add fried paneer.
mix gently making sure the sauce has coated well uniformly.
finally, transfer schezwan paneer to a serving bowl and garnish with chopped spring onions green. serve with fried rice.

chilli mushroom recipe | chilli mushroom.name: chilli mushroom recipe | chilli mushroom dry | mushroom chilli recipe
chilli mushroom recipe | chilli mushroom.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour
¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, prepare the sauce by heating 3 tsp oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 2 green chilli.
also, add 2 tbsp spring onion and saute on high flame.
furthermore, add ¼ onion and ¼ capsicum. saute slightly till the blisters appear.
now add 2 tbsp tomato sauce, 1 tsp chilli sauce, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp soy sauce, ¼ tsp pepper, ¼ tsp sugar and ¼ tsp salt.
saute on high flame till the sauce thickens.
pour the corn flour water and stir continuously till the gravy thickens and turns glossy.
add in fried mushroom and mix gently coating sauce well.
finally, serve chilli mushroom recipe garnished with few chopped spring onions along with fried rice.

cabbage vada recipe | cabbage vadai | ca.name: cabbage vada recipe | cabbage vadai | cabbage dal vada
cabbage vada recipe | cabbage vadai | ca.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take ¾ cup chana dal, ¼ cup urad dal and ¼ cup toor dal.
soak in enough water for 2 hours.
drain off the water completely and rest for 10 minutes.
blend to a coarse paste without adding any water.
transfer the dal mixture to a large bowl.
now add 2 cup cabbage, 1 chilli, 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp dill leaves, few curry leaves, 1 tsp cumin, pinch hing and 1 tsp salt.
squeeze and mix well combining the mixture well.
make a soft dough adding 2 tbsp of rice flour if the mixture is watery.
grease hands with oil and prepare small balls, flatten the vada.
and deep fry in hot oil. or preheat and bake at 180 degree celcius for 25 minutes or until it turns golden and crisp.
