garlic pickle recipe | chilli garlic pic.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tbsp kashmiri chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a pan heat ¼ cup oil. use mustard oil for more flavours.
further add 25 cloves garlic, 3 green chilli and 3 inch ginger.
saute on medium flame till the garlic turns slightly golden. do not over roast the garlic as it doesn't taste great for pickle.
furthermore add 1 tbsp chilli powder, ½ tsp turmeric and pinch of hing.
saute for 30 seconds on low flame or till spices gets cooked well.
cool the mixture completely.
meanwhile, dry roast 1 tsp mustard, ¼ tsp methi and ½ tsp fennel.
crush and powder them finely.
furthermore add powdered masala to the prepared garlic mixture.
also add 1 tsp salt and 2 whole lemon juice. mix well.
finally, serve instant chilli garlic pickle with paratha or curd rice.

chilli pickle recipe | hari mirch ka ach.name: chilli pickle recipe | hari mirch ka achar | green chilli pickle recipe
chilli pickle recipe | hari mirch ka ach.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, remove the head of chillis and cut into pieces.
further, in a kadai dry roast 1 tsp jeera, 2 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tsp coriander seeds, Â¼ tsp methi, 1 tsp saunf and Â½ tsp ajwain.
dry roast on low flame for a minute.
cool completely, and blend to slightly coarse powder.
transfer to the masala powder onto the chillis.
also add in 1 tsp turmeric, salt to taste and 1 lemon.
mix well making sure everything is combined well.
now heat Â¼ cup oil. use mustard oil for more flavours.
once the oil is hot, add in pinch of hing.
allow the oil to cool completely and pour over chillis.
mix well to combine all the ingredients well.
also add in 2 tbsp vinegar. vinegar acts as preservative and stores for longer time.
mix well and can be consumed after 2 hours or keep under sun for 2 days for more flavours.
finally, serve instant green chilli pickle with rice or roti.

tomato pickle recipe | tomato pachadi re.name: tomato pickle recipe | tomato pachadi recipe | tomato achar recipe
tomato pickle recipe | tomato pachadi re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1Â½ tbsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, heat oil and add in tomatoes.
saute for a minute making sure is oil is coated well to tomatoes.
now cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
after 10 minutes, tomatoes have cooked completely turning soft and mushy.
add in Â½ cup tamarind extract and mix well.
again cover and simmer for 10 more minutes.
now the mixture has turned thick and saute till oil is released from sides.
add methi-mustard powder, turmeric, chilli powder, salt and jaggery.
saute on low flame till the spices gets cooked well.
pour the garlic tempering over tomato pickle and mix well.
finally, serve tomato pickle along with rice, idli or dosa.

basket chaat recipe | potato basket reci.name: basket chaat recipe | potato basket recipe | aloo basket chaat
basket chaat recipe | potato basket reci.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
steps: firstly, peel and grate 3 potato. use fresh potatoes, else aloo basket will not be crispy.
now rinse the grated raw potato well to remove of starch.
drain off the potato and squeeze out water completely.
further add ½ cup corn flour and ½ tsp salt.
squeeze the potato and prepare a moist potato mixture.
now spread the potato mixture over sieve.
deep fry in hot oil until it turns golden brown.
finally, prepare the potato basket chaat using prepared aloo basket.

singapore noodles recipe | veg singapore.name: singapore noodles recipe | veg singapore noodles | singapore mei fun
singapore noodles recipe | veg singapore.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly heat 2 tbsp sesame oil and saute 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger, 1 chilli and 2 tbsp spring onion.
further, saute ½ onion until it slightly changes colour.
additionally add 1 carrot, ¼ cup cabbage and ¼ capsicum.
stir fry on high flame without overcooking vegetables.
furthermore add ¼ tsp turmeric, ¼ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp coriander powder, ¼ tsp pepper and ½ tsp salt.
saute on low flame without burning the spices.
now add 2 tbsp soy sauce and mix well.
add in cooked noodles and mix well.
finally, enjoy singapore noodles topped with spring onions and roasted sesame seeds.

tortilla chips recipe | nachos chips rec.name: tortilla chips recipe | nachos chips recipe | mexican chips recipe
tortilla chips recipe | nachos chips rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 cup maize flour / makkai ka atta)
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup maize flour and ½ cup wheat flour.
also add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp pepper, ½ tsp salt and 2 tsp oil.
mix well making sure all the spices are combined well.
now add ½ cup water and start to knead the dough.
knead to stiff and smooth dough adding water as required.
pinch a ball sized dough, and dust with wheat flour.
roll slightly thick, dusting wheat flour as required.
prick the roll with a fork, preventing from puffing up while frying.
trim the sides and cut into triangle pieces.
now drop the triangle chips into the medium hot oil. or bake in preheated oven at 180 degree celcius for 25 minutes.
fry on low to medium flame stirring in between.
fry on low flame until the nachos chips turn crisp and golden brown for 10 minutes.
drain off the chips over kitchen paper.
finally, enjoy nachos chips with roasted tomato salsa or store it for a month in an airtight container.

sev recipe | omapodi recipe | how to mak.name: sev recipe | omapodi recipe | how to make omapodi mixture
sev recipe | omapodi recipe | how to mak.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup besan and Â¼ cup rice flour.
also add Â¼ tsp turmeric, pinch of hing and Â½ tsp salt. combine well.
now add Â¼ cup water (or as required) and prepare smooth dough. the dough will be slightly sticky, thats normal.
grease the small holed mould with some oil and stuff dough into it.
further, press and spread the sev in hot oil forming a circle in the oil and make sure you do not overlap.
after a minute, flip over and fry the other side.
finally, drain over kitchen paper to absorb oil and repeat making more sev with the remaining dough.

boondi recipe | kara boondi recipe | how.name: boondi recipe | kara boondi recipe | how to make khara boondi
boondi recipe | kara boondi recipe | how.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmir red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup besan and 2 tbsp rice flour.
also add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, pinch of hing, ¼ tsp baking soda and ½ tsp salt.
now add water and prepare a thick batter.
directly into hot oil, take small holes perforated spoon and pour besan batter.
fry golden and crisp. also fry cashews and curry leaves.
finally, mix everything and serve khara boondi.

uttapam recipe | onion uttapam | uthappa.name: uttapam recipe | onion uttapam | uthappam recipe | masala uttapam
uttapam recipe | onion uttapam | uthappa.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 3 cup dosa rice / sona masuri rice
2 cup puffed rice / churumuri / murmura, washed & squeezed
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 2 onion, 2 chilli, 1 inch ginger, few curry leaves, 2 tbsp coriander and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined.
also, heat the griddle and pour a ladleful of dosa batter.
spread out in a circular motion slightly thick than regular masala dosa.
now spread the toppings on top of the uttappa evenly.
after the topping have been added press gently so the toppings are pressed into the batter.
add 1 tsp of oil around the uttappa.
cover it and let it cook for 1-2 minutes in low flame.
flip over on the other side once the uttappa turns golden brown.
finally, onion uttapam is ready to be served with chutney of your choice.

mysore pak recipe | easy homemade mysore.name: mysore pak recipe | easy homemade mysore pak recipe
mysore pak recipe | easy homemade mysore.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 cup besan / gram flour / chickpea flour / kadle hittu, sieve well
steps: firstly, in a large kadai add ghee and oil.
further get to a boil and simmer till you prepare mysore pak.
firstly, in a large heavy bottomed / non stick kadai take sugar and water. get to a boil.
keep boiling and stirring till the sugar attains one string consistency.
furthermore, keep the flame on very low and add sieved gram flour little by little.
give a good stir making sure no lumps are formed.
further add more besan and continue stirring. add approximately in 3-4 batches.
adding in batches and continuously stirring avoids from forming lumps.
now take a ladleful of hot ghee-oil and pour over the besan mixture.
further,continuously stir till oil is absorbed completely.
furthermore, add another ladleful of hot oil-ghee. sizzles and starts to froth at the top.
keep continuously stirring till all the oil is absorbed.
further, keep repeating 4-5 times till the mixture starts to separate from pan.
and also the oil will start releasing from sides. no more the besan mixture will absorb oil.
immediately, transfer the mixture to greased tray of enough depth. this helps to continue cooking and get golden brown colour in between.
further, after 5 minutes cut into pieces as desired.
after 30 minutes separate the pieces.
finally, serve perfect taste and textured mysore pak.

palak pulao recipe | spinach pulao recip.name: palak pulao recipe | spinach pulao recipe | spinach rice recipe
palak pulao recipe | spinach pulao recip.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 cup palak leaves / spinach, finely chopped
steps: firstly, in wide pan, take a tsp of ghee. optionally, you can use oil.
add chopped onions and green chilli. fry till they turn translucent.
time to add finely chopped palak leaves and fry for a minute till they shrink and change its colour.
once the palak leaves are cooked, add peas and fry till the peas are cooked.
finally, add cooked rice and salt to taste.
mix well without breaking rice grains. cook for a minute.
finally, serve palak pulao with raita or as it is.

carrot rice recipe | carrot pulao recipe.name: carrot rice recipe | carrot pulao recipe | carrot pulav recipe
carrot rice recipe | carrot pulao recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in wide pan, take a tsp of ghee. optionally, you can use oil.
furthermore, add mustard seeds, jeera and curry leaves. allow to splutter.
additionally, add cashews and fry till they turn golden brown.
once the cashews turn almost golden brown, add chopped onions and green chilli. fry till they turn translucent.
time to add grated carrot and fry for a minute till they shrink and change its colour.
once the carrot are cooked, add turmeric powder and salt to taste. give a good stir.
also add cooked rice.
furthermore, mix well without breaking rice grains. cook for a minute.
finally. serve carrot rice with raita or as it is.

pan fry ghee rice recipe | nei choru rec.name: pan fry ghee rice recipe | nei choru recipe | ghee rice recipe |
pan fry ghee rice recipe | nei choru rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: in wide pan, take a tbsp of ghee.
once the ghee starts to melt, add jeera.
also add spices like bay leaf, cardamom, cloves, star anise, cinammon stick and black pepper. saute till they turn aromatic.
now add cashews and fry till they turn golden brown.
once the cashews turn almost golden brown, add sliced onions, ginger and garlic. fry till the raw smell of ginger and garlic disappears.
finally, add cooked rice and salt to taste.
mix well without breaking rice grains. cook for a minute.
serve ghee rice with raita, saagu or as it is.

aloo pakora recipe | potato pakora recip.name: aloo pakora recipe | potato pakora recipe | aloo bajji or potato bajji
aloo pakora recipe | potato pakora recip.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, peel the skin of potato and slice thinly.
rinse in cold water to remove off starch from potatoes.
now pat dry to remove of excess water. keep aside.
further, prepare besan batter by taking ¾ cup besan and 2 tbsp rice flour in a mixing bowl.
also add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp chaat masala, a pinch of hing / asafoetida, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and ½ tsp salt.
combine all the ingredients well.
add in ½ cup water and whisk smooth.
make a smooth batter without forming any lumps.
also, add a pinch of baking soda and mix gently. do not over mix as baking soda will lose its property.
make sure the batter is flowing consistency.
dip the sliced potato into prepared besan batter and coat it completely.
furthermore, deep fry in hot oil.
also stir occasionally and fry on both sides.
further, fry the potatoes till they turn golden brown
finally, aloo pakora recipe or potato bajji is ready to serve.

instant oats dosa recipe | oats masala d.name: instant oats dosa recipe | oats masala dosa | oats dosa with aloo bhaji
instant oats dosa recipe | oats masala d.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, take ¾ cup powdered oats, ½ cup rice flour, ¼ cup rava and ½ cup curd.
now add 1 tsp jeera, 1 inch ginger, 1 green chilli, few curry leaves, ½ tsp pepper, 2 tbsp coriander, ½ onion and 1 tsp salt.
add 3 cups of water and prepare a flowing consistency batter.
rest the batter for 20 minutes.
now carefully pour the dosa batter over hot tawa.
sprinkle ½ or 1 tsp of oil from the top.
once the dosa roasts to golden brown, add in a tbsp of aloo bhaji.
finally, fold the dosa to half and serve instant oats masala dosa immediately with coconut chutney.

instant chole bhature recipe | chole bha.name: instant chole bhature recipe | chole bhatura recipe with soda water
instant chole bhature recipe | chole bha.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2Â½ cups maida / plain flour / all-purpose flour / refined flour
1 cup chana masala / chole masala, for serving
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2Â½ cups maida.
add in Â½ cup rava. rava helps to make bhatura soft from inside and crisp from outside.
also add 1 tsp sugar, Â½ tsp salt and 1 tbsp oil.
combine well making sure everything is combined well.
now add Â½ cup of soda water.
knead the dough well adding more soda water as required.
prepare smooth and soft dough. do not make too soft dough as it absorbs oil.
cover the dough with moist cloth and rest for 30 minutes or more.
after 30 minutes, knead dough slightly and pinch a small ball sized dough and flatten.
roll the dough evenly into circles using rolling pin dusting maida as required.
further, roll and get to a circular shape. roll neither too thin nor too thick.
when the oil is very hot, drop one bhatura and, press with the spoon to puff up.
also once they begin to puff, splash oil over the bhatura till they puff completely.
flip over and fry the bhatura till golden brown all over.
then drain the bhatura onto tissue paper to remove excess oil.
finally, serve instant bhatura with chana masala / chole masala.

paneer tikka masala recipe | paneer tikk.name: paneer tikka masala recipe | paneer tikka gravy | paneer tikka sabji
paneer tikka masala recipe | paneer tikk.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
¼ tsp  cumin powder / jeera powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tsp butter and saute 1 bay leaf.
now add 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and saute until it turns golden brown.
further, add spice powder and ½ tsp salt.
saute on low flame until it turns aromatic.
now add 1 cup tomato puree and ½ cup cashew paste and continue to saute.
add in the leftover marinated mixture and mix well.
further, add 1 cup water and mix well adjusting consistency as required.
now add in prepared paneer tikka and mix well.
cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until the flavours are absorbed.
add in 2 tbsp coriander and 1 tsp kasuri methi.
finally, enjoy paneer tikka masala recipe with tandoori roti.

methi puri recipe | how to make methi pu.name: methi puri recipe | how to make methi puri | methi poori | methi ki puri
methi puri recipe | how to make methi pu.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ cup rava / semolina / suji, fine
¾ cup methi / fenugreek leaves, finely chopped
steps: firstly take 2 cup wheat flour.
also add ¼ cup rava, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp pepper, ¼ tsp ajwain, pinch hing, 2 tbsp ghee and ½ tsp salt
crumble and mix well making sure all the spices are mixed well.
further, add ¾ cup methi and ¼ cup water.
knead a tight dough well-adding water as required.
dust wheat flour and roll slightly thick as of poori.
using a cookie cutter / glass cut small round puri.
fry the poori in medium hot oil. alternatively, bake in preheated oven at 180-degree celsius for 15 minutes.
fry on medium flame till they turn crispy and golden in colour.
drain off the methi puri over kitchen paper to absorb excess oil.
finally, serve methi puri with evening chai or store in airtight container for a month.

pyaz ki kachori recipe | onion kachori |.name: pyaz ki kachori recipe | onion kachori | jaipuri pyaaz kachori recipe
pyaz ki kachori recipe | onion kachori |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, pinch a small lemon sized ball and flatten it.
now scoop 1 tbsp of prepared pyaz stuffing and place in the centre.
get the edges together and form a bundle.
close the top by pressing and flattening.
furthermore, gently press the edges and flatten to form a poori size.
when the oil is medium hot, add prepared kachori.
do not touch it for a minute or till they float. then press with the spoon to puff up. turn around and fry the kachori till it turns golden brown all over.
finally, serve pyaz kachori as it is or with green chutney and tamarind chutney.

farsi puri recipe | crispy gujarati fars.name: farsi puri recipe | crispy gujarati farsi poori | namkeen farsi poori recipe
farsi puri recipe | crispy gujarati fars.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ cup rava / semolina / suji, fine
steps: firstly take 2 cup wheat flour. you can also use maida for more flaky farsi puri.
also add ¼ cup rava, 1 tsp pepper, ½ tsp cumin, ¼ tsp ajwain,½ tsp salt and 2 tbsp ghee.
crumble and mix well making sure all the spices are mixed well.
further, add ½ cup water.
knead a tight dough as of poori.
now divide the dough into half.
dust wheat flour and roll slightly thick as of poori.
prick the puri with a fork to prevent from puffing up.
using a cookie cutter/glass to cut small round puri.
fry the poori in medium hot oil. alternatively, bake in preheated oven at 180-degree celsius for 15 minutes.
fry on low flame till the farsi puri floats. this takes approx 1-2 minutes.
now continue to fry on medium flame till they turn crispy and golden in colour.
drain off the farsi puri over kitchen paper to absorb excess oil.
finally, serve farsi puri with evening chai or store in airtight container for a month.

kadai paneer recipe | karahi paneer | ho.name: kadai paneer recipe | karahi paneer | how to make kadai paneer gravy
kadai paneer recipe | karahi paneer | ho.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves
½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large kadai, heat 1 tbsp butter and saute 1 bay leaf, 1 green chilli, 1 tsp kasuri methi till they aromatic.
further saute ½ onion petals and ½ cubed capsicum.
add ¼ tsp turmeric and ½ tsp chilli powder.
further add blended tomato-onion paste and mix well.
in addition, add prepared kadai masala and 1 tsp salt.
cook till the masala paste starts to release oil.
now add ½ to 1 cup water adjusting consistency as required.
add 12 cubes homemade paneer, 2 tbsp cream and mix gently.
cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
furthermore, add ¼ tsp garam masala and 2 tbsp coriander leaves. mix well.
finally, serve restaurant-style kadai paneer gravy hot with garlic naan or chapati.

palak paneer recipe | how to make palak.name: palak paneer recipe | how to make palak paneer recipe restaurant style
palak paneer recipe | how to make palak.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves
steps: take blanched palak, 1 inch ginger, 1 clove garlic and 4 green chilli.
blend to smooth paste without adding any water. keep aside.
now in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil, 1 tsp butter and roast the spices till it turns aromatic.
further, add ½ onion and saute till it turns golden brown
additionally, add ½ tomato and saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
add prepared palak paste, ¼ cup water and ¾ tsp salt.
mix well adjusting consistency as required.
further, add roasted paneer and mix well.
simmer for 5 minutes or till paneer absorbs flavour.
turn off the flame and add ¼ tsp garam masala, 1 tsp kasuri methi and 2 tbsp cream. mix well.
finally, serve restaurant-style palak paneer with roti / naan.

puri recipe for pani puri | gol gappe pu.name: puri recipe for pani puri | gol gappe puri recipe | golgappa recipe
puri recipe for pani puri | gol gappe pu.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tbsp maida / plain flour / all purpose flour / refined flour
Â¼ cup water, or as required
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl takeÂ 1 cup sooji andÂ 2 tbsp maida
also addÂ pinch of baking soda, Â¼ tsp salt and 1 tsp oil.
combine all the ingredients well.
further addÂ Â¼ cup water and start to knead.
knead to smooth and soft adding more water if required.
grease the dough with oil. cover and rest for 20 minutes or untill the rava absorbs moisture.
now knead the dough again making sure the dough is stiff absorbing moisture.
divide the dough into half and dust with maida.
furthermore, roll the dough as thin as possible using a rolling pin.
take a small cup and start to make small puris.
drop the prepared puri and press with the spoon to puff up.
once they puff, it will automatically turn over. if not, once the bottom side is golden brown, turn over the puri.
and fry the puri till golden brown and crisp.
remove the puri and drain over tissue paper to remove excess oil.
finally, golgappa puri is ready to prepareÂ pani puriÂ orÂ bhel puri.

amla pickle recipe | amla achar or amla.name: amla pickle recipe | amla achar or amla ka achar | gooseberry pickle
amla pickle recipe | amla achar or amla.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ cup mustard oil / any cooking oil
2 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, wash and steam the amlas (gooseberry / nellikayi) for 10 minutes.
cook till the amlas open up by itself. allow it to cool completely.
further, open the amla by separating the segments and removing the seeds from centre.
spread it on the plate and allow to cool completely.
meanwhile, prepare the pickle masala by heating the pan.
dry roast 2 tsp mustard, 1 tsp methi and 1 tsp fennel seeds till they turn golden.
transfer to the blender and blend to fine powder. keep aside.
furthermore, heat Â¼ cup mustard oil or any cooking oil.
once the oil is hot, add in 1 tsp mustard and pinch of hing. allow to splutter.
additionally, switch off the stove and add in steamed amlas.
saute for a minute or till the amlas absorb flavour.
further add in 2 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp turmeric and 1 tsp salt. mix well.
also add prepared pickle masala and mix well.
finally, instant amla pickle is ready to be served.

udupi style sambar powder recipe | samba.name: udupi style sambar powder recipe | sambar powder recipe
udupi style sambar powder recipe | samba.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 15-20 red chilli, both guntur and byadgi mixed
steps: in a thick bottomed kadai, add 4 tsp of oil and roast coriander till they turn fragrant. take off in a plate and keep aside.
now add 2 tsp of oil and fry chana dal, urad dal, jeera on low flame. also add methi and fry till they change colour. take off in a plate and keep aside
finally add 2 tsp of oil and roast red chillis and curry leaves.
allow the fried spices to cool. once cooled, grind everything to a smooth powder adding little hing / asafetida.
cool completely and store in air tight container.

aloo bhujia recipe | aloo ki bhujia | ha.name: aloo bhujia recipe | aloo ki bhujia | haldiram alu bhujia | namkeen bhujia
aloo bhujia recipe | aloo ki bhujia | ha.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large bowl grate 1 potato finely.
add 1½ cup besan and ¼ cup rice flour.
also add 1 tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp garam masala, 1 tsp chaat masala, ½ tsp aamchur, ¾ tsp salt and 2 tsp oil.
mix well making sure everything is combined well.
knead the dough adding water if required to a smooth and soft dough.
the dough will be slightly sticky, grease 1 tsp oil and knead to smooth, soft and non-sticky dough.
grease the small holed mould with some oil and stuff dough into it.
further, press and spread the bhujiya in hot oil forming a circle in the oil and make sure you do not overlap.
after a minute, flip over and fry the other side till it turns golden and crisp.
drain over kitchen paper to absorb oil.
finally, break aloo bhujia into pieces and enjoy tea time snack.

potato bites recipe | aloo bites recipe.name: potato bites recipe | aloo bites recipe | chilli garlic potato bite
potato bites recipe | aloo bites recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 3 boiled and mashed potato.
add ½ cup bread crumbs and 2 tbsp corn flour. they help to absorb moisture.
also, add ¾ tsp garlic paste, 1 tsp chilli flakes, 1 tsp mixed herbs, ¼ tsp pepper powder and ½ tsp salt.
squeeze and mix well forming a soft dough.
if the dough is still sticky, add 1 tbsp breadcrumbs and mix well. this helps to absorb moisture. keep aside.
further, take a small ball sized aloo mixture, and shape into cubes.
dip in corn flour slurry all over.
then roll in breadcrumbs. make double coating to get a crispy outer layer.
now deep fry in hot oil or bake in a preheated oven at 180 degree celcius for 15 minutes.
stir occasionally, until it turns golden brown and crisp. drain over kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
finally, enjoy aloo bites / potato bites with tomato sauce.

samosa recipe | how to make samosa | alo.name: samosa recipe | how to make samosa | aloo samosa
samosa recipe | how to make samosa | alo.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: pinch a ball sized dough and grease with oil.
roll the dough into oval shape.
now cut it horizontally, diving into 2 equal portions using a knife.
grease with water and make cone.
stuff 2 tbsp of prepared samosa masala into the cone.
grease little water on the edges.
close and seal tightly by pressing firmly.
deep-fry the samosa on a low flame. alternatively bake at 180 degree celcius for 40 minutes.
stir occasionally, frying the samosa on low flame for atleast 15 minutes.
once the aloo samosa turns golden and crisp, drain off over kitchen paper.
finally, enjoy aloo samosa with green chutney and tamarind chutney.

aloo lachha namkeen | aloo lacha chivda.name: aloo lachha namkeen | aloo lacha chivda | potato lachha | potato sticks
aloo lachha namkeen | aloo lacha chivda.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder
steps: firstly, peel and grate 3 potato. use fresh potatoes, else namkeen will not be crispy.
now rinse the grated raw potato well to remove of starch.
drain off the potato and squeeze out water completely.
pat dry the potatoes to remove any water if present.
transfer the grated potato into a large bowl.
add 2 tbsp corn flour and mix well. corn flour helps to make namkeen more crispy.
deep fry the potato by spreading into hot oil.
using the chopstick fry the potato uniformly.
fry on medium flame, until the potato turns golden and crisp.
drain off the potato over kitchen paper to remove excess oil.
now in the same oil fry ¼ cup peanuts, ¼ cup cashew, 2 tbsp dry coconut, few curry leaves and 2 dried red chilli.
also add ½ tsp pepper, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp aamchur and ½ tsp salt.
mix gently making sure all the spices are coated well.
finally, enjoy aloo lachha namkeen for a month when stored in an airtight container.

sukha puri recipe | stuffed sukha poori.name: sukha puri recipe | stuffed sukha poori chaat | sukha masala puri
sukha puri recipe | stuffed sukha poori.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
½ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
¼ tsp dry mango powder / aamchur
pinch of kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 boiled and mashed potato.
add ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp cumin powder, ¼ tsp aamchur, 1 tsp chaat masala, 1 tsp green chutney and ¼ tsp salt.
mix all the ingredients well. aloo mixture ready.
now in a small plate take 7 puri and make a hole in the centre.
stuff in prepared aloo mixture. do not overstuff the mixture.
also sprinkle, chaat masala, salt and chilli powder.
add in fine sev into each puri.
further, garnish with chopped coriander leaves and squeeze ¼ lemon juice.
finally, serve sukha puri immediately after pani puri or enjoy as it is.

aloo ki poori recipe | aloo ki puri reci.name: aloo ki poori recipe | aloo ki puri recipe | masala poori recipe
aloo ki poori recipe | aloo ki puri reci.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ tsp ajwain seeds / caraway seeds
Â½ tsp dry mango powder / aamchur powder
water as required to knead dough
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl, grate 2 medium sized boiled potato.
then, to that add 1 cup wheat flour.
also add 1 tbsp sooji. this helps to make poori crispy.
now add spices like chilli powder, garam masala powder, dry mango powder, ajwain seeds and salt to taste.
furthermore, add a tsp of oil.
then mix the spices, flour and aloo well.
now slowly add water as required and prepare a stiff dough.
make a tight and stiff dough as you make for pooris.
cut the dough into small or medium pieces with the help of knife.
make small lemon sized balls between your palms.
also roll the dough evenly into circles using rolling pin.
when the oil is sufficiently hot, add one poori.
and press with the spoon to puff up.
once they puff, it will automatically turn over.
and fry the poori till golden brown all over.
finally, serve aloo poori as it is or with curries of your choice.

bhatura recipe | punjabi bhature recipe.name: bhatura recipe | punjabi bhature recipe | bhatura for chole bhatura
bhatura recipe | punjabi bhature recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 cups maida / all-purpose flour / plain flour
Â¼ tsp baking soda / cooking soda
Â½ cup maida / all-purpose flour / plain flour, for dusting
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take maida.
to that add rava, sugar and salt.
also add baking powder and baking soda and mix well.
furthermore, add oil and rub with the flour.
also add curd and start to knead dough.
knead and punch the dough well for atleast 5 minutes.
further, grease the dough with oil.
cover with moist cloth and rest for atleast 2 hours.
further, roll and get to a long shape. pinch the dough into medium sized balls.
then make balls between your palms.
finally, roll the dough evenly into circles using rolling pin. roll neither too thin nor thick.
firstly, heat oil in a deep frying pan or kadai. when the oil is sufficiently hot, add one bhatura.
and, press with the spoon to puff up.
also once they begin to puff, splash oil over the bhatura till they puff completely.
flip over and fry the bhatura till golden brown all over.
then drain the poori into tissue paper to remove excess oil. fry all batura same way.
finally, serve bhatura with chole curry.
full recipe for chole masala

bhindi ka salan recipe | okra ka salan r.name: bhindi ka salan recipe | okra ka salan recipe - biryani gravy
bhindi ka salan recipe | okra ka salan r.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: dry roast peanuts, coconut and sesame seeds till they turn fragnant.
blend to smooth paste after cooling completely.
in the same pan, heat about 3 tsp of oil and fry okras on medium flame. the okras has to turn golden brown. remove the bhindi and keep aside.
now in the same pan heat oil and add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, methi seeds. fry till they splutter.
time to add sliced onions and fry till they turn golden brown.
now add ginger-garlic paste cook this till raw smell is gone.
next, add red chilly powder, turmeric, coriander powder, green chilly, curry leaves and fry a minute. keep an eye on flame as the masala should not burn.
now to this add peanut and sesame seed paste prepared earlier.
add water to make a thin paste. you might have to add almost a cup of water here.
cook this on a slow flame for 30 minutes. after 30 minutes the oil floats from the sides. keep stirring in between so that it doesn't burn from bottom.
then add chopped coriander, tamarind juice, jaggery, salt
once it comes to boil add fried bhindi and cook this on a slow flame for 5 minutes.

mirchi ka salan recipe | how to make hyd.name: mirchi ka salan recipe | how to make hyderabadi mirchi ka salan recipe
mirchi ka salan recipe | how to make hyd.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp poppy seeds / khus khus / gasgase
1 tsp kashmiri chili powder / lal mirch powder
Â½ cup water, as required to blend
Â½ medium sized onion, finely chopped
2 cups water, as required to adjust consistency
steps: firstly, dry roast peanuts, sesame seeds, poppy seeds and coconut.
transfer to small blender and allow it to cool completely.
also add ginger and garlic, garam masala, turmeric and chili powder, methi seeds.
add water as required and blend to smooth paste. keep aside.
in a kadai heat oil and fry de-seeded green chili. keep aside.
now add cumin and curry leaves.
furthermore, add onions and saute.
add prepared masala paste, tamarind water, jaggery and salt.
mix well and add 2 cups of water.
cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
further place the fried chilis into salan and also add coriander leaves.
cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
finally, serve mirchi ka salan with biryani or roti.

sambar recipe | south indian sambar reci.name: sambar recipe | south indian sambar recipe | vegetable sambar recipe
sambar recipe | south indian sambar reci.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tsp sambar powder, home made udupi style sambar powder
1 tbsp coconut oil / any cooking oil
steps: firstly, in a pressure cooker add Â½ cup of toor dal with 2 cups of water. also add pinch of turmeric. pressure cook it for 5 whistles.
meanwhile, in a small bowl take small half lemon sized tamarind and soak in water.
also, prepare and chop veggies like carrot, eggplant, drumstick, onions and tomatoes.
now, in a large kadai take the tamarind water.
to that add 1 tsp of jaggery/sugar along with green chill, salt and turmeric powder.
furthermore, add all the chopped vegetables to same mixture.
meanwhile, once the dal is cooked mash it well.
after 10 minutes, the vegetables should be cooked properly.
now add the mashed toor dal and bring it to boil.
add 2 tsp of sambar powder.
mix the sambar powder and bring it to boil.
prepare the tempering by heating urad dal, mustard seeds, hing, curry leaves and red chillies.
add the tempering to the freshly prepared sambar.
finally, sambar is ready.

mysore masala dosa recipe | mysore dosa.name: mysore masala dosa recipe | mysore dosa | mysore masala dose
mysore masala dosa recipe | mysore dosa.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1Â½ cup dosa rice / sona masuri rice
Â½ cup thin poha / aval / flattened rice / avalakki, washed
steps: firstly prepare dosa batter, red chutney and aloo bhaji.
once the dosa batter has fermented well mix it gently.
and now add Â½ tsp salt and Â¼ tsp sugar to the batter and mix well.
also heat the griddle and pour dosa.
add in 1 tsp of butter, 1 tbsp red chutney and spread.
also, add in potato bhaji filling .
roast for 15-30 seconds and fold the dosa.
finally, serve mysore masala dosa hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

rice murukku recipe | rice chakli | rice.name: rice murukku recipe | rice chakli | rice flour murukku | rice flour chakli
rice murukku recipe | rice chakli | rice.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¼ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ cup roasted gram dal / putani / pottukadalai
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 2½ cup rice flour, 2 tbsp butter, pinch hing, 1 tsp sesame, ¼ tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp salt.
transfer the roasted gram dal powder to the same bowl.
crumble and mix well.
further, add water as required and knead to soft dough.
start preparing chaklis on the wet cloth or butter paper make small spiral shape chaklis by pressing.
seal the ends so that it doesn’t fall apart while deep frying.
take one murukku at a time a and slide it into hot oil. or bake in preheated oven at 180-degree celsius for 15 minutes.
flip the murukku and fry on medium flame till they turn crispy from both sides.
furthermore, drain over a paper towel to remove excess oil.
finally, serve crispy and murukku / chakli with masala tea or masala milk.

gathiya recipe | gathia recipe | bhavnag.name: gathiya recipe | gathia recipe | bhavnagari tikha gathiya sev recipe
gathiya recipe | gathia recipe | bhavnag.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 cup besan.
add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp ajwain, pinch hing and ¼ tsp salt.
also, add 2 tbsp oil and ¼ tsp baking soda.
mix well making sure all the spices are mixed well.
now add ¼ cup water (or as required) and knead the dough.
the dough will be slightly sticky, grease hand with oil and knead to smooth, soft and non-sticky dough.
grease the large-holed mould with some oil and stuff dough into it.
further, press and spread the gathiya / sev in hot oil forming a circle in the oil and make sure you do not overlap.
after a minute, flip over and fry the other side.
finally, drain over kitchen paper to absorb oil and repeat making more gathiya with the remaining dough.

instant neer dosa recipe | neer dose rec.name: instant neer dosa recipe | neer dose recipe with rice flour
instant neer dosa recipe | neer dose rec.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 1 cup rice flour and add salt to taste.
add in 1Â½ cup water, or as required.
mix with the help of whisk to avoid forming lumps.
add more water if required, and get to flowing consistency.
now heat dosa tawa very well.
add a tsp of oil and wipe off with the help of kitchen towel.
pour the prepared dosa batter over tawa. you should be able to see some holes forming while pouring batter over tava. thats the right consistency of batter. if not you need to add some more water.
cover the dosa with a lid. and allow to cook on medium flame.
scrape from sides once the dosa is cooked completely.
finally, serve instant neer dosa with chutney or coconut-jaggery mixture.

tandoori roti recipe in toaster | tandoo.name: tandoori roti recipe in toaster | tandoori roti maker for home
tandoori roti recipe in toaster | tandoo.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 cups of wheat flour.
further add in Â½ tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder and salt to taste.
also add in Â¼ cup curd and 1 tbsp oil.
combine all the ingredients well.
additionally, add in water as required and knead the dough.
knead 5 minutes or more to get smooth and soft dough.
cover with the moist cloth and rest for 20 minutes.
again knead slightly, making sure the dough is smooth and soft.
pinch a small ball sized dough.
make a ball and flatten it slightly.
dust with wheat flour before rolling.
roll the dough slightly thick to 5 inch diameter. (depending on the size of toaster)
now roast the roti on hot tawa.
half cook the roti both the sides.
now transfer the half cooked roti into the toaster.
and turn on the toaster. i have kept the setting to meter 2. however, adjust the meter accordingly and it takes the same heat as required to toast the bread.
wait till the tandoori roti pops up and puffs up.
now using the forceps place the tandoori roti on to the plate.
brush with generous amount of butter.
finally, serve tandoori roti prepared from toaster along with palak paneer.
notes:

paneer bhurji recipe | how to make dry p.name: paneer bhurji recipe | how to make dry paneer bhurji recipe
paneer bhurji recipe | how to make dry p.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste / adrak lasun ka paste
Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves, crushed
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat oil and saute cumin seeds till they turn aromatic.
further add onions, green chilli and ginger-garlic paste.
saute well till the onions turn slightly golden brown.
now add tomatoes and saute till they turn soft and mushy.
additionally, add Â½ tsp red chilli powder, Â¼ tsp turmeric, Â½ tsp garam masala powder and salt to taste.
roast the spices on low flame for a minute.
furthermore add crumbled paneer / cottage cheese and mix gently.
mix gently without mashing out paneer.
cover and simmer for 3 minutes till the paneer gets cooked well. do not over cook paneer, as they turn hard and chewy.
also add crushed kasuri methi and coriander leaves.
mix gently, making sure everything is combined well.
finally, serve paneer bhurji hot with chapathi or paratha.

methi malai paneer recipe | methi paneer.name: methi malai paneer recipe | methi paneer recipe | paneer methi malai recipe
methi malai paneer recipe | methi paneer.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 bunch methi leaves / fenugreek leaves, washed and finely chopped
Â½ tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder
1 cup tomato pulp / puree of 2 large tomatoes
Â¼ cup water, add as required
steps: firstly heat oil and add cumin seed, bay leaf, cloves, cardamom and cinnamon stick. saute.
additionally, add ginger garlic paste, green chili and onions. saute.
now add spice powder like chili powder, turmeric and coriander powder. saute.
also add tomato pulp and saute till it thickens.
also saute till the masala start to release oil.
now add sauted methi leaves.
additionally add sugar and salt.
saute for a minute.
now add milk, cream and water.
also add paneer cubes and give a gentle mix.
additionally add garam masala.
cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
finally, serve methi malai paneer with chapathi or paratha.

gulla bolu koddel recipe | gulla bolu hu.name: gulla bolu koddel recipe | gulla bolu huli | eggplant sambar
gulla bolu koddel recipe | gulla bolu hu.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: cube the brinjal / eggplant / gulla into big pieces and keep immersed in water.
extract thick juice from tamarind and keep ready.

cook the eggplant / gulla pieces in 1 cup of water with jaggery, green chilies (optional), curry leaves, turmeric, tamarind juice and salt. cover and cook till they loose its green colour and turn pale.
when the eggplant / gulla pieces are cooked, add cooked - smashed dal and stir well.
now add udupi sambar powder and coconut oil.
now cook for atleast 2-3 minutes. till it starts to boil.
add coriander leaves and serve with hot steamed rice.

shahi paneer recipe | shahi paneer masal.name: shahi paneer recipe | shahi paneer masala | shahi paneer ki sabji
shahi paneer recipe | shahi paneer masal.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a kadai heat 1 tbsp butter and saute 2 pods cardamom, 1 inch cinnamon,1 pod black cardamom and 3 cloves.
now add 1 onion, 3 clove garlic and 1 inch ginger.
saute slightly until onion softens.
further, add 2 tomato and saute slightly.
also, add 1 cup water and 1 tsp salt. mix well.
cover and boil for 20 minutes or until it softens completely.
cool completely and transfer to a blender. blend to smooth paste without adding any water.
sieve the puree making sure the puree is smooth and silky. keep aside.
in a large kadai heat 1 tbsp butter and saute ½ tsp shahi jeera and 1 bay leaf.
keeping flame on low add ¼ tsp turmeric and 1 tsp chilli powder.
saute slightly until the spices turn aromatic.
add in the prepared tomato-onion puree and mix well.
further, add ¼ cup cream and mix until everything is well combined.
add in 15 cubes paneer, few threads saffron and mix well.
cover and simmer for 5 minutes or until flavours are absorbed well.
now add ½ tsp kasuri methi and ¼ tsp garam masala. mix well.
finally, enjoy shahi paneer with roti or garlic naan.

mirchi bajji recipe | chilli bajji | mir.name: mirchi bajji recipe | chilli bajji | mirapakaya bajji | menasinakai bajji
mirchi bajji recipe | chilli bajji | mir.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, take long green chilis and slit at the centre and remove seeds.
now prepare the bajji batter by taking 2 cup besan and 2 tbsp rice flour in large mixing bowl.
also add ¼ tsp ajwain, ¼ tsp baking soda and ½ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is combined well.
now add ½ cup of water and mix well.
add water as requried and prepare a lump free thick batter.
further pour 1 tbsp of hot oil over the batter and mix well.
mix well to smooth and silky batter.
now dip the green chilli and coat it with besan batter completely.
wipe off slightly, exposing green chilli slightly.
deep fry in hot oil dropping batter coated chillis slowly.
keeping the flame on medium, flip over and fry all the sides.
fry until the bajjis turn crisp and golden brown.
finally enjoy mirchi bajji with sauce or chutney.

paneer hyderabadi recipe | hyderabadi pa.name: paneer hyderabadi recipe | hyderabadi paneer masala | paneer hyderabadi masala
paneer hyderabadi recipe | hyderabadi pa.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 3 tsp oil and saute 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 2 chilli.
now add ½ tomato and saute until tomato softens.
further, add 1 bunch palak, ¾ cup coriander and saute well.
saute until the palak shirks completely.
cool completely and transfer to the blender.
add ½ cup water and blend to smooth paste.
in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and saute 1 tsp cumin, 1 bay leaf, 1 inch cinnamon, 2 pods cardamom and 3 cloves.
saute until the spices turn aromatic.
further, add prepared palak puree and saute well.
now add 2 tbsp curd and 2 tbsp cream.
saute until the curd and cream are well combined.
additionally, add ¼ tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp coriander powder and ¾ tsp salt. saute well.
add ½ cup water and adjust consistency as required.
further, add 12 cubes paneer and mix well.
cover and simmer for 3 minutes or until flavours are absorbed well.
also, add ¼ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp kasuri methi.
finally, enjoy hyderabadi paneer with roti.

tandoori momos recipe | how to make tand.name: tandoori momos recipe | how to make tandoori momo in pan
tandoori momos recipe | how to make tand.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1½ cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour
1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, in a large cup take ½ cup curd.
also add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp garam masala, 1 tsp kasuri methi, 1 tsp lemon juice, 1 tsp oil and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well making sure all the spices are combined well.
coat the momos with prepared marination and rest for 1 hour.
heat kadai with 2 tbsp oil and place the marinated momos.
cook for 2 minutes on medium flame.
flip over and cook all sides well.
finally, serve tandoori momos sprinkled with chaat masala and coriander leaves.

paneer biryani recipe | paneer biriyani.name: paneer biryani recipe | paneer biriyani recipe | veg paneer dum biryani
paneer biryani recipe | paneer biriyani.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ¾ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a large bowl take 1 cup curd, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste, ¼ tsp turmeric, ¾ tsp chilli powder and 2 tbsp biryani masala.
also add 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint, 1 tsp oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice and 1 tsp salt.
whisk and combine well making sure the spices are well combined.
further add 15 cubes paneer, ½ onion and ½ capsicum.
mix gently making sure everything is combined well.
cover and marinate for 30 minutes.
firstly, in a large vessel take 6 cup water.
add spices like 2 pods cardamom, 4 cloves, 1 inch cinnamon, 2 bay leaf, ½ tsp pepper.
also add 1 tsp salt, 2 tsp oil and 1 chilli.
boil for 2 minutes or until flavours is in the water.
add in 1 cup basmati rice and stir well. make sure to soak rice for at least 20 minutes.
boil for 3 minutes or until rice is half cooked. do not cook fully.
drain off the rice and keep aside.
firstly, in a large kadai heat 2 tbsp oil and 1 tsp ghee.
saute 2 bay leaf, 1 star anise, 1 pod black cardamom, 1 mace, 2 pods cardamom and 1 tsp shah jeera.
add ½ onion and saute until it turns golden brown.
also add 1 tomato and saute until it turns soft and mushy.
add in marinated paneer and saute well.
saute until the oil separates from sides. do not overcook as paneer turns rubbery.
further spread prepared rice uniformly.
also top with 2 tbsp coriander, 2 tbsp mint and 2 tbsp fried onion.
further sprinkle pinch biryani masala, 2 tbsp saffron milk, 1 tsp ghee and ¼ cup water.
cover with aluminium foil and close the lid. you can also use the dough to seal.
simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is cooked fully.
finally, enjoy paneer biryani with raita and slices of onion.

paneer butter masala recipe | paneer mak.name: paneer butter masala recipe | paneer makhani | butter paneer recipe
paneer butter masala recipe | paneer mak.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 1 tsp butter and 1 tsp oil.
saute 1 onion, 1 inch ginger and 3 clove garlic until it shrinks slightly.
now add 2 tomato and 10 cashew for a minute.
cover and cook for 10 minutes or until tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
cool completely and transfer to the blender.
blend to smooth paste adding water if required.
in a kadai heat 2 tbsp butter and saute 2 pods cardamom and 1 bay leaf.
keeping the flame on low add ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp garam masala and ¼ tsp cumin powder.
saute until the spices turn aromatic without burning.
add in prepared onion tomato paste and saute well.
saute until oil separates from sides.
further add 1 cup water, ½ tsp sugar and 1 tsp salt.
mix well adjusting consistency as required.
also, add 2 tbsp cream and mix well.
now add 20 cubes of paneer and mix gently.
cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until flavours are absorbed.
further add 2 tbsp coriander, ½ tsp kasuri methi and ¼ tsp garam masala. mix well.
finally, enjoy paneer butter masala with roti or naan.

paneer frankie recipe | paneer kathi rol.name: paneer frankie recipe | paneer kathi roll | paneer wrap
paneer frankie recipe | paneer kathi rol.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, in a kadai heat 1 tbsp butter and roast 1 cup cubed paneer.
roast until paneer turns golden brown. keep aside.
now add 2 tsp oil and saute 1 onion, 1 tsp ginger garlic paste.
saute until onions turn olden brown.
further, add ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp chilli powder, ½ tsp coriander powder, ¼ tsp cumin powder and ½ tsp garam masala.
saute on low flame until spices turn aromatic.
now add 1 cup tomato pulp and saute well. to prepare tomato pulp, blend 3 ripened tomato to a smooth paste.
saute until the oil separates from tomato paste.
further, add 2 tbsp water, ½ tsp salt and mix well
add in roasted paneer, ½ capsicum and mix well.
cover and simmer for 4 minutes.
now add 2 tbsp coriander and mix well. paneer stuffing ready.
firstly, in a small bowl take ½ tsp chilli powder, ¼ tsp turmeric, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ½ tsp chaat masala, ½ tsp amchur and ¼ tsp salt.
mix well and spice mix is ready.
firstly, take wrap or chapati and warp if required.
add 1 tbsp eggless mayonnaise and 1 tsp chilli sauce. mix and spread uniformly.
now add in 2 tbsp prepared paneer stuffing and spread slightly.
top with 1 tbsp cabbage, 1 tbsp carrot and few onions.
sprinkle in prepared frankie masala and squeeze 1 tsp lemon juice.
also, grate 2 tbsp cheddar cheese uniformly.
now roll tight without allowing the stuffing to come out.
tuck the ends make it well secured.
finally, cut into halves and enjoy paneer frankie.

paneer chilla recipe | paneer cheela | p.name: paneer chilla recipe | paneer cheela | paneer ka chilla
paneer chilla recipe | paneer cheela | p.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: firstly, mix the besan chilla batter again and take a ladleful of batter.
pour the batter on hot tawa.
spread gently making sure the chilla is slightly thick.
spread a tsp of oil around the corners.
allow to cook on low to medium flame for a minute or until the bottom is cooked completely.
now flip gently without breaking the chilla.
press gently, making sure the chilla is cooked from both sides.
now spread 2 tbsp of prepared paneer stuffing on half of the chilla.
fold half and roast slightly crisp.
finally, enjoy paneer chilla with green chutney and tamarind chutney.

paneer kofta recipe | paneer kofta curry.name: paneer kofta recipe | paneer kofta curry | stuffed paneer kofta masala
paneer kofta recipe | paneer kofta curry.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves
steps: firstly, mix all the ingredients to make small round kofta.
roll them in corn flour for extra crisp out covering.
deep fry in hot oil or bake in preheated oven at 180 degree celsius for 20 minutes.
stir occasionally, and fry on medium flame.
fry till the kofta turn golden and crisp.
drain off the paneer koftas and and in tomato onion based curry.
cover and simmer for 8 minutes or till the kofta absorbs curry.
additionally, add Â¼ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp crushed kasuri methi. stir well.
finally, serve paneer kofta curry with jeera rice , roti or naan.

khoya paneer recipe | how to make khoya.name: khoya paneer recipe | how to make khoya paneer curry
khoya paneer recipe | how to make khoya.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves
1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
steps: firstly, roast spices with butter.
now add 1 onion followed by 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and 1 green chilli. saute well.
further, add 2 cup tomato pulp. to prepare tomato pulp, blend 3 raw tomatoes to smooth puree without adding any water.
cover and cook for 10 minutes or till oil separates from the tomato paste.
now add ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, ¾ tsp coriander powder, ¼ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp salt. saute well.
now add ¾ cup of prepared khoya and cook well.
further, add 1 cup of water and adjust consistency.
add in roasted paneer and give a good mix.
cover and simmer for 10 minutes or till paneer absorb flavours.
finally, serve khoya paneer with roti or naan.

paneer kolhapuri recipe | how to make sp.name: paneer kolhapuri recipe | how to make spicy paneer kolhapuri gravy
paneer kolhapuri recipe | how to make sp.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ tsp balck pepper / kali mirch
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves, crushed
steps: firstly, in a pan dry roast all the spices listed for masala on low flame for 2 minutes.
blend to fine powder and kolhapuri masala is ready. keep aside.
heat 3 tbsp oil and fry 9 cubes paneer. keep aside.
in the same oil add in 1 bay leaf, onion, ginger garlic paste and saute well.
furthermore add 3 tomato and cook well.
mash the tomatoes well with the help of potato masher.
add in prepared kolhapuri masala, Â¼ tsp turmeric and 1 tsp salt.
saute on low flame till oil separates from masala.
now add 1 cup water and mix well adjusting consistency.
add in fried paneer.
cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
now add 1 tsp crushed kasuri methi and mix well.
finally serve paneer kolhapuri masala with tandoori roti or garlic naan.

sagu recipe | mixed veg sagu recipe | ve.name: sagu recipe | mixed veg sagu recipe | vegetable saagu recipe
sagu recipe | mixed veg sagu recipe | ve.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 cup veggies of your choice, beans, carrots, peas, potatoes
steps: firstly, for the masala, grind all the ingredients to a smooth paste with some water. cashews are added to give thickness to the gravy.
also add coriander leaves and coconut while making a paste.
heat oil in pan; temper with mustard seeds, urad dal, cumin seeds, hing, curry leaves.
add finely chopped onions and fry till they turn translucent.
now add all the veggies of your choice and cook with some salt and water. you can even pressure cook them if you want.
cooking veggies takes atleast 10 minutes.
furthermore, add the masala paste prepared previously.
mix and allow it to boil well for 5 minutes. the raw smell of coconut has to disappear.
in addition, add water to get the desired consistency.
finally, serve hot with poori, rava idli, set dosa, chapati or even plain rice.

poori bhaji recipe | aloo bhaji recipe |.name: poori bhaji recipe | aloo bhaji recipe | aloo bhaji for puri recipe
poori bhaji recipe | aloo bhaji recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: boil the potato till they are soft. peel the skin and cut into medium pieces. keep aside.
finely chop green chillies, ginger, coriander leaves. also thinly slice onion and keep ready.
in a pan heat oil and add cumin seeds, mustard seeds, urad dal, red chilli and channa dal. allow to splutter
then add curry leaves and hing. fry for a minute.
now add thinly sliced onion and fry till then turn translucent.
also add chilli and ginger. fry till the raw smell of ginger goes away.
now add boiled and chopped potato and give a quick stir. also add turmeric powder, little water and salt to taste.
mash the potatoes and cook for about 4 min.
squeeze some lemon juice and garnish it with fresh chopped coriander leaves.
serve aloo bhaji hot with poori.

bhindi curry recipe | shahi bhindi masal.name: bhindi curry recipe | shahi bhindi masala gravy | shahi bhindi sabzi
bhindi curry recipe | shahi bhindi masal.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder
Â¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves, crushed
steps: firstly, prepare onion tomato paste.
now heat kadai with 2 tbsp oil and saute 10 okra.
further heat 2 tbsp oil and saute spices till they turn aromatic.
now add in prepared onion tomato paste and saute for a minute.
cover and simmer for 10 minutes or till onion paste gets cooked completely.
add in Â¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, Â½ tsp coriander powder, Â¼ tsp cumin powder and 1 tsp salt. saute on low flame.
further add Â¼ cup curd keeping the flame on low and stir continuously.
also add 1 cup of water and mix well.
now add fried bhindi and give a mix.
boil for 2 minutes or till bhindi absorbs masala.
add in 2 tbsp cream, Â¼ tsp garam masala and 1 tsp kasuri methi. mix well.
finally, serve shahi bhindi masala with roti or paratha.

dahi bhindi recipe | dahi wali bhindi re.name: dahi bhindi recipe | dahi wali bhindi recipe | okra yogurt gravy
dahi bhindi recipe | dahi wali bhindi re.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tbsp water, or as required to blend smooth
Â¼ tsp methi seeds / fenugreek seeds, optional
1 - 2 tsp kashmiri chilli powder, adjust according to your spice level
1 cup thick curd / yogurt, whisked smooth
Â¼ cup water, or as required to adjust consistency
steps: in a kadai add 2 tsp of oil and fry onions, ginger and garlic.
fry till they turn slightly golden in colour. allow to cool completely.
add required water and blend to smooth paste. keep aside.
in the same kadai, add a tsp of oil and fry chopped bhindis.
fry till bhindi cook from all sides and changes colour to dark green.
remove and keep aside.
in the same kadai, add a tsp of oil along with mustard seeds, jeera, methi and hing.
once they splutter add curry leaves.
now add prepared onion puree and saute for a minute.
add spices like chilli powder, turmeric, coriander powder and salt to taste. fry the masala on low flame.
add some water.
then add 1 cup curd / yogurt and stir on low flame.
immediately add fried bhindi / okra and give a good stir.
remember to switch off the flame. close the lid and allow to cook for 5 minute.
garnish with few coriander leaves.
then add a pinch of garam masala. and give a good mix.
serve dahi bhindi with hot rice / chapathi.

paneer pulao recipe | how to make paneer.name: paneer pulao recipe | how to make paneer peas pulav recipe
paneer pulao recipe | how to make paneer.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¾ tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder
Â¼ cup paneer / cottage cheese, crumbled
steps: firstly, in a large pan heat ghee and saute paneer till they turn golden brown. keep aside.
in the same, pan add cumin, cinnamon stick, cloves and black pepper.
saute them on low flame till they tun aromatic.
further add thinly sliced onions, ginger, garlic and green chilli.
now add tomato and saute till they turn soft and mushy.
add carrot and peas. saute well.
furthermore, add red chili powder, garam masala powder and salt. saute.
now add crumbled paneer and mix well.
also add cooked rice and mix gently.
place the fried paneer on the prepared pulao cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
also garnish with fried paneer pieces, coriander and crumbled paneer.
finally, serve paneer pulao with onion tomato raita.

jeera rice recipe | how to make jeera ri.name: jeera rice recipe | how to make jeera rice | jeera pulao
jeera rice recipe | how to make jeera ri.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: now in a large heat 1 tsp ghee and splutter 1 tsp cumin seeds.
now add in cooked basmati rice, ¼ tsp salt and mix gently.
finally, add 2 tbsp coriander leaves and enjoy jeera rice with dal.
firstly, in a cooker heat 1 tsp ghee and splutter 1 tsp cumin seeds.
now add ½ cup basmati rice (soaked 20 minutes) and saute for a minute.
add 1 cup of water, ¼ tsp salt and mix well.
cover and pressure cook for 2 whistles.
finally, add 2 tbsp coriander leaves and enjoy jeera rice with dal.

cucumber sasmi (chutney) / southekai sas.name: cucumber sasmi (chutney) / southekai sasmirecipe
cucumber sasmi (chutney) / southekai sas.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tsp coconut oil or cooking oil
steps: firstly, chop the cucumber finely and keep it aside.
further in a small blender add coconut, mustard seeds, red chillies, salt and tamarind together.
blend to a fine paste adding water as required.
add finely chopped cucumber to grounded coconut paste.
mix the coconut paste and cucumber well.
furthermore, heat a kadai add coconut oil, mustard seeds, urad dal, broken red chilly and curry leaves.
when the mustard seeds splutter pour the seasoning to the saasmi.
finally, serve cucumber saasmi along with hot rice or with dosas and idliy's.

majjige huli recipe | kovakkai mor kuzha.name: majjige huli recipe | kovakkai mor kuzhambu | tindora yoghurt curry
majjige huli recipe | kovakkai mor kuzha.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 cup tindora / dondakaya / ivy gourd / kovakkai / tendli / tondekai
steps: firstly, prepare masala paste by taking ¾ cup coconut, 3 green chilli, few curry leaves and 1 tbsp soaked rice in a small blender.
add ½ cup water and blend to smooth paste. keep aside.
now in a large kadai take 2 cups sliced tindora.
further add 1 cup water, few curry leaves, ½ tsp salt and mix well.
cover and boil for 10 minutes or till tindora cook well.
now add in prepared coconut masala paste along with ¼ tsp salt.
mix well adjusting consistency as required.
boil for 5 minutes or till the raw smell of coconut disappears.
turn off the flame and add ½ cup sour curd. make sure to whisk the curd before adding to prevent from curdling.
mix well till the kodekane / majjige huli turns silky texture.
pour the tempering over majjige huli and mix well.
finally, serve majjige huli / kovakkai mor kuzhambu with hot steamed rice.

paneer momos recipe | paneer momo | veg.name: paneer momos recipe | paneer momo | veg paneer momos
paneer momos recipe | paneer momo | veg.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, knead the dough again slightly and pinch a small ball sized dough.
dust with maida and roll thin.
place a tbsp of prepared paneer stuffing in centre.
start pleating from one side.
pleat until you reach ¾ of the circle.
now seal the pleated part with other part and secure tight.
heat a steamer and arrange the momos in the tray without touching each other.
furthermore, steam momos for 12-15 minutes or till shiny sheen appears over it.
finally, paneer momos recipe is ready to enjoy with momos chutney.

tawa paneer recipe | paneer tawa masala.name: tawa paneer recipe | paneer tawa masala | paneer tawa fry
tawa paneer recipe | paneer tawa masala.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: ½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder
steps: roast the marinated paneer pieces on hot tawa adding oil as required.
flip over and roast on all the sides. keep aside.
now in a large kadai heat 1 tsp butter and 2 tsp oil.
once the oil is hot add 1 tsp cumin and roast until the jeera turns aromatic.
further, add 1 onion followed by 1 tsp ginger garlic paste. saute well.
also, add ½ capsicum and saute for a minute without overcooking the capsicum.
keeping the flame on low add ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder and ½ tsp salt. roast in low flame.
now add ¾ cup tomato puree and saute well. to prepare tomato puree, blend 3 ripened tomatoes into a fine paste.
saute until the tomato puree thickens and oil is released from sides.
further, add 3 tbsp water and mix well.
add in roasted paneer pieces and mix gently.
finally, add 2 tbsp coriander and enjoy tawa paneer recipe with roti.

paneer bhurji gravy recipe | street styl.name: paneer bhurji gravy recipe | street style paneer ki bhurji gravy
paneer bhurji gravy recipe | street styl.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves, crushed
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat 1 tbsp butter and add Â½ tsp cumin, 1 bay leaf.
saute till the spices turn aromatic.
further add 1 medium onion and saute well.
also add 1 tsp ginger garlic paste and continue to saute.
additionally add 2 medium tomato and saute.
saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
now mash well with potato masher or blend smooth.
furthermore add Â½ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, Â½ tsp coriander powder and Â¾ tsp salt.
saute on low flame for a minute.
also add 2 tbsp peas and saute for 2 minutes.
additionally add 1 cup water and mix well adjusting consistency.
stir well and get to boil.
further add 2 cups of crumbled paneer / cottage cheese.
mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
now add Â½ tsp garam masala, 1 tsp kasuri methi and 2 tbsp coriander leaves. mix well.

dum aloo recipe | punjabi dum aloo recip.name: dum aloo recipe | punjabi dum aloo recipe | dhaba style dum aloo
dum aloo recipe | punjabi dum aloo recip.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 1 - 1Â½ tsp chilli powder, adjust to your spice level
Â¼ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder, optional
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves
Â¾ - 1 cup water, adjust to required consistency
steps: in a kadai, add a tsp of oil along with cumin seeds.
once they splutter, add prepared masala paste and fry for 5-6 minutes.
now add spices like chilli powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and salt to taste.

soya chunks curry recipe | soya bean cur.name: soya chunks curry recipe | soya bean curry recipe | soya bean recipe

ingredients: 1 tsp kashmiri chilli powder / lal mirch powder
1 tsp kasuri methi / dry fenugreek leaves, crushed
steps: firstly, boil soya chunks for 8 minutes and transfer to a bowl of cold water.
allow to rest for 10 minutes and squeeze completely.
firstly, heat kadai and add oil and saute onion, ginger and garlic.
also add tomatoes, cashews and saute well.
blend to smooth paste. keep aside.
firstly, in a large kadai heat oil.
further, add cumin, bay leaf, cinnamon stick and saute.
then add finely chopped onions and saute.
also add chilli powder and turmeric.
now add prepared onion-tomato masala paste and saute.

sprouts curry recipe | moong sprouts sab.name: sprouts curry recipe | moong sprouts sabzi | sprouts recipe
sprouts curry recipe | moong sprouts sab.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¾ cup whole moong dal / green gram dal
1 tsp kashmiri red chili powder / lal mirch powder
Â½ tsp dry mango powder / aamchur powder
steps: firstly in a large kadai heat oil.
further add mustard seeds, cumin and hing. allow to splutter.
additionally, add onions and continue to saute.
also add ginger garlic paste and green chili. saute well till the raw aroma disappears.
furthermore, add tomato and saute well.
saute till the tomatoes turn soft and mushy.
additionally, add turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, garam masala powder, dry mango powder, jaggery and salt.
saute on low flame till the masala gets cooked well completely and releases oil from sides.
further add sprouted moong dal.
also add water and mix well.
adjust the consistency by adding water as required.
cover and simmer for 20 minutes or pressure cook for 2 whistles.
cook the dal well however, do not over cook as the sprouts will loose their nutritional value.
finally, serve sprouts curry along with jowar roti or rice.

aam panna recipe | kairi panha recipe |.name: aam panna recipe | kairi panha recipe | mango panna drink | aam jhora
aam panna recipe | kairi panha recipe |.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
steps: firstly, in a pressure cooker take 1 raw mango and pour 2 cup water.
cover and pressure cook for 5 whistles or until mango are cooked well.
cool completely, and peel the skin of mango.
also, scrape the pulp of mango making sure the skin has separated.
transfer the mango pulp to a blender.
also add 3 tbsp mint, ¼ cup sugar.
blend to smooth paste without adding any water.
now add ½ tsp cardamom powder, ½ tsp cumin powder, ½ tsp pepper powder and ¾ tsp salt.
mix well making sure everything is well combined. aam panna concentrate is ready.
to serve, in a tall glass take a tbsp of aam panna concentrate and add few ice cubes.
pour in ice-cold water and mix well.
finally, enjoy aam panna garnished with fresh mint leaves.

veg kolhapuri recipe | vegetable kolhapu.name: veg kolhapuri recipe | vegetable kolhapuri recipe restaurant style
veg kolhapuri recipe | vegetable kolhapu.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

1 small carrot, cut into thick pieces
1 tsp poppy seeds / khus khus / gasgase
½ capsicum, cubed (colour of your choice)
steps: firstly boil vegetables along with little salt for 10 minutes.
in a large kadai dry roast, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, coriander seeds, cumin seeds.

dry roast and blend to smooth powder without adding any water. keep aside.
heat oil and saute onions add ginger-garlic paste.

also add prepared masala and salt to taste.
saute well till the oil separates from the masala.

cover and simmer for 15 minutes.

bhindi masala recipe | bhindi masala gra.name: bhindi masala recipe | bhindi masala gravy recipe | okra masala curry
bhindi masala recipe | bhindi masala gra.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 tbsp oil, for sauting bhindi / okra
6 bhindi / okra / lady's finger, 1.5 inch length
1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste / adrak lasun paste
½ medium sized onion, finely chopped
1 tsp kashmiri chili powder / lal mirch powder
¼ cup cashew paste / 7 cashews paste
steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat oil and saute bhindi.
sauté on medium flame stirring occasionally.
remove and keep aside.
now in the same kadai add 2 tsp of oil if required.
also add jeera and sauté till it turns aromatic.
furthermore, add ginger-garlic paste and sauté.
also add onions and continue to sauté.
add spices like chili powder, turmeric, coriander powder and garam masala.
sauté for a minute on low flame till the spices are cooked well.
now add tomato pulp and sauté continuously till the oil separates and forms thick masala paste.
now add cashew paste, salt add water as required to adjust the consistency.
get the gravy to boil.
further add sautéed bhindi and mix gently.
cover and simmer the gravy for 5 minutes.
now add coriander leaves and mix well.

kulcha naan recipe | plain kulcha recipe.name: kulcha naan recipe | plain kulcha recipe | butter kulcha on tawa
kulcha naan recipe | plain kulcha recipe.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: 2 cup maida / plain flour / all purpose flour
¾ cup water, to knead dough
¼ cup coriander leaves, finely chopped
steps: firstly, in a large mixing bowl take 2 cup maida, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, ¼ tsp baking soda, ½ tsp salt and 2 tsp oil.
add in ¼ cup curd and mix well.
further add ¾ cup water or as required and knead dough.
knead to smooth and soft dough adding more water if required.
cover and rest for 2 hours or more.
pinch a ball sized dough and flatten.
sprinkle some black sesame seeds and coriander leaves.
gently roll to oval shape using rolling pin.
brush with water over kulcha.
furthermore, slowly flip the kulcha and put it on hot tawa.
now after a minute, flip the tawa upside down and cook kulcha directly on flame till they turn golden brown and puffs up.
gently scrape the kulcha from bottom and remove.
also brush some butter.
finally, serve plain kulcha hot with your favourite curry like paneer butter masala.

lauki kofta recipe | lauki ka kofta | ho.name: lauki kofta recipe | lauki ka kofta | how to make bottle gourd kofta curry
lauki kofta recipe | lauki ka kofta | ho.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN

Â½ tsp kashmiri red chilli powder / lal mirch powder

also add in besan and spices.
mix well and prepare kofta.
coat with corn flour and deep fry.
drain and keep aside.
firstly, heat oil and add in cumin and bay leaf.
further add turmeric and chilli powder.
add in prepared onion tomato paste and saute well.

add in leftover lauki water and curd.

aloo gobi masala recipe | how to make al.name: aloo gobi masala recipe | how to make aloo gobi curry - restaurant style

steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat oil.
further saute onions, garlic and ginger till they turn translucent.
also add tomatoes and saute well.
additionally add cashews and saute.
cool completely and blend to smooth paste, adding water as required.
firstly, add oil and saute jeera, bay leaf and cinnamon stick till they turn aromatic.

also add coriander powder and salt.

cover and cook for 10 minutes.

dill pulao recipe | dill rice recipe | s.name: dill pulao recipe | dill rice recipe | sabsige soppu pulao

ingredients: 1 bunch dill leaves / sabsge soppu / savaa / sabbasige soppu / sada kuppi / chathakuppa / soa-kura, roughly chopped
steps: firstly, in a cooker heat ghee and sautÃ© black pepper, cinnamon stick, cloves, star and bay leaf.

furthermore, add ginger-garlic paste and sautÃ©.

later add soaked basmati rice. soak basmati rice for 20-30 minutes.
sautÃ© for a minute without breaking rice grains.
also add chopped dil leaves.

add salt to taste and give a good mix.
cover and pressure-cook for 2 whistles on medium flame.

veg makhanwala recipe | vegetable makhan.name: veg makhanwala recipe | vegetable makhanwala | veg makhani recipe
veg makhanwala recipe | vegetable makhan.AUTHOR: HEBBARS KITCHEN
ingredients: Â¼ cup peas / matar, fresh / frozen
Â½ tsp kashmiri chili powder / lal mirch powder

steps: firstly, in a large kadai heat butter and saute vegetables along with salt.
furthermore add capsicum and continue to saute.
cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
remove and keep aside.
further, in a kadai heat butter.
add bay leaf and cumin seeds. saute till they turn aromatic.
also add in tomato - cashew paste.
saute for 5 minutes stirring continuously.
saute till the tomato paste thickens and oil separates from sides.

saute on low flame for a minute.
furthermore add 1.5 cups of water.
mix well and get to a boil.
